Overall, one of the worst purchases I have ever made. I want a solid refund or a replacement, very dissatisfied.
Great product, fast shipping.

Bought it when it was on sale for $219 and love it. Good sound and easy to use. Also it's very stable even when I'm working out or using it for a run, and I have a pretty small head as well :) We shall see how long this thing works!
Stopped working after nine months and ear pads completely disintegrated don’t recommend. Two pairs owned same issue. Pricy lesson learnt don’t buy

The Beats Solo 3 have been great. The connect to my phone, tablet and watch easily and the battery life is amazing. After purchasing them I made 3 cross country trips and never had to charge them. The sound quality is amazing. My only complaint is that when using them for extended periods my ears can get a little sore. I'm very happy with my purchase.
Bought for my son for Christmas. He loves them, they work very well. Sound quality is amazing. They are made wit good material. The price was reasonable.

My headphones came sealed and brand new. I don’t know why some people are saying theirs were fake ??!
They should first check out the sellers page and see the reviews.
But anyhow I like my Mickey noise beats. The only problem is the Bluetooth calling :( everyone says they can’t hear me well. Maybe it doesn’t work well outdoors ??

The BEST headphones I have ever owned. Im a bit of a sucker for looks and brand which people criticize a lot of Beats users for but I say screw those people because you can have both looks AND quality with Beats. I had the beats solo 2 wireless and I cant begin to tell you what a step up the Solo 3's are. The battery life is seriously unbelievable. I use them ranging from 3-4 hours a day and sometimes up to 6 hours (I use them for work) and the battery lasts WEEKS its seriously incredible. When the battery gets low ill charge for 5 minutes and it's back up to 3 dots. It's INCREDIBLE, I dont even think my old Nokia's battery lasted this long! The finish of these headphones is about the same as the Solo 2's except for the gorgeous shiny rose gold accents as opposed to the fully matte finish of the Solo 2's. These headphones look amazing, sound even better, and the battery lasts a ridiculously long time. The price tag is hefty but as someone who uses these every day for work they were worth every penny.

I've noticed some people complaining about the same issue the Solo 2's had. It's uncomfortable to use them for an extended period of time because they are tight. Yes, at first they ARE pretty tight on your skull and are unbearable for over 2 hours. However, over time they DO stretch out and guys this happens to most On-Ear headphones. If you have very large ears I would recommend getting the Studios since they are OVER ear. If you want to speed out the stretch out process just stretch them out over something about the same size as your head and leave them overnight. Repeat this until they are comfy although dont stretch them too much or they will fall easily. I use these now for up to 6 hours at a time and they are very comfy. If you have earrings you might want to take them off before prolonged use, the back of the earrings will be poking into your skull.

Overall these headphones impressed me and this is coming from someone who already owned the great Solo 2's. You will not regret getting these.

*I did NOT receive these for free or discounted price, I paid full price for them and this review and my opinion are MY OWN and not influenced in any way.

The sound quality was very good, but the headphones leak a lot of sound so if you're listening in a quiet place, everyone can hear your music. Also, these headphones are not headphones for being active, because they fall off a lot. The material and the quality of them though, is very good. Also very comfortable. Again though, if you plan on doing anything active, these are not the right ones. Update, the rubber cushion on the head strap came off of the headphones

luv these headphones, no doubt, connect with press of a button on iPhone, but should come on automatic without no touch!
dr dre has to fix this problem! a bit pricey! well worth the sound! and also when its too hot, your ears be sweating! so i settled for smaller ear plugs!
comes with a wire , in case battery goes down, but it has a great battery life!

These sound great but within 3 Months the plastic on the adjuster band split. The item was defective but beats would not honor the warranty and wanted to charge $129 to fix. Expected better quality materials and for beats to stand behind their products.

These are great!
The wireless function does peter out in very cold weather - so if you plan to be walking around in cold weather you may be disappointed. That's a definite thing. Happened to me once, but I don't make it a habit to be outside in cold weather. Aside from that, like I said - Great! Particularly the battery life!

Very disappointed, one side stopped working approximately 13 months after purchasing. Beats/apple customer service stated it would be better/cheaper to buy a new pair. Pretty expensive for 13 months of use.

I’d love to give this a full 5 star over all, however when I’m working out and go go lower my head, the headphones half the time slide around my head/ears and lately they’ve started falling off. The headband has adjustable settings which are nice, but I have mine set on the shortest. Maybe it’s bc I’ve had mine for 2 years and they’ve ‘stretched? I’m not sure. The stability is the only issue I have, everything is perfect

Bought these because they hold a charge for 40 hours of playback which is true and I'm happy to report it took almost a month of use before needing it's first charge. However, these have been charging for almost 2 days now and it still shows one light on the charging indicator. I've tried several different outlets, chargers and cords.....no luck. Furthermore I've tried to get product support twice now and no luck can't hey anyone to respond. If I get some help in happy to change this review but I'm getting impatient right now. At this point I will never but a beats product again nor will I buy high dollar items through Amazon again if I don't get help soon.

The pause/skip button glitches and sometimes doesn’t function until I reset the headphones. The cover for the earmuff padding has also come loose from its adhesive exposing the padded foam. Overall these are my favorite headphones yet, but they were poorly made. I have owned them for less than two years.

I normally purchase from Best Buy, my last pair of solo 3 beats broke...after about 2 years or so. Decided to purchase a new pair, although amazon made me a bit skeptical at first... I decided to purchase a pair. Although the reviews on amazon for this product was
Pretty negative. My package looks REAL, although the case for the beats solo 3 DO NOT come with white inside, at least the last pair I purchased from Best Buy did NOT have the white lining. The packaged was sealed so I’m hoping these are real and not a rip off. For now we’ll see how well these new beats are. I would of given it a 5* but like I said the case for beats looked off.
We love these beats! This was our first purchase and they’re amazing! The sound is high quality and it cancels the rest. The only downfall is the way they slide on my head but otherwise I love them!

Great sound but quality of the headphones is poor. A few months after purchase, I had to send them back because the fabric on the headphones came apart. All warranties go through Apple, so they sent a replacement. Well, it recently happened AGAIN! Apparently, they only warranty for 90 days when they send a replacement so they offered the option of buying another pair for $100. No thanks...

These sound decent, bass is garbage and they hurt my ears after long periods of use. Bought them for $140 so i had to jump on them given their msrp is $300. Overall, fit and finish is great and sound quality is okay .
Well can’t really say much about this but it kind of broke after a month of using ,I don’t know if it’s apples fault or this was just not of the best quality

These Beats appear to be authentic. They have great sound and I love the rose gold color. It was super easy to pair them with my iPhone 7. Additionally, I selected the 1 day shipping method at 11pm and they were at my doorstep the following day at 2:15pm! I couldn’t be happier.

Terrible they stopped working after 3 weeks. The left ear would not work at all on wireless. We did some troubleshooting and they reset but immediately stopped working again. I researched the issue and it is very common with the solo3 wireless headphones. My son loved them, but we returned for a refund.
They started falling apart after a couple of months the ear covers then 3 month one side stop working don't buy one had$30 pair last a lot longer

I'm a frequent business traveler and these headphones are exactly what I needed for business trips. They drown out noise on the plane and make it possible to take a nap with ease. Also great for daily commuting on public transportation. You can receive calls directly through the headphones so makes it especially easy to communicate while on the go!

Noise cancellation worked but after a month of wearing them (how convenient that the return window closed after a month) they started giving my husband BAD headaches. Did some research and realized it’s like sticking your head in a microwave it’s so bad for you! Not sure the quality of noise cancellation outweighs the health risks associated with it.
The noise cancellation is great. The sound is awesome, but these honestly hurt my ears to wear for extended periods. I’m giving them to my sister.
Doesn't stay on or connected to Bluetooth turns on and off won't charge or turn on anymore
Don't really have much noise isolation but amazing sound quality and bass not very good for kids but let's face it you get beats to pump the bass up got at good price 150 overall great for the price
My husband got it for me and the battery life last for a long time. I go to the gym 4-5 times a week for 1-2 hours and i only have to charge it maybe twice a month.

My daughter loves her new Beats Solo3. She loves the rose gold color and the fact that she can't hear me when I'm calling her when she has them on :-). She
says it sounds really good and clear. The price was excellent. Love it!
The Beats wireless headset was a great gift, my grandson cried when he open it up. He just loved it and very clear. His dad also liked it.
A thirteenth birthday gift for my grandson -- he was thrilled. Perfect color and he said they were the most comfortable he'd used,, along with great sound. Nannie got a high-five and a hug!
I buy a beats solo 3 from Amzon warehouse deals and a get a fake

This was a gift for my niece and she loves it! I will be ordering one for myself as well!! It was shipped and delivered right before Christmas. This style does not go out of style and the ear buds are super soft and handle is sleek. The black color matches with everything, that’s why she wanted it as well. I highly recommend 👍🏼
Bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas. She is in love with them. Couldn't beat the price at the time since they dropped because of Black Friday.

First I was spectical that these were even on sale because we all know Beats are overpriced for what you get. Thank being said, since these are discounted they are definitely a great buy. I wouldn't spend $300 on these but I will $220. These are real and they came in the original packaging.

Now for the review. As others have noticed that Beats are very bass heavy, I like this even though I listen to a lot of metal but to some they don't like it. The sound populated is excellent. There aren't any cracks or interruptions at all. These are a very high quality SOUND headphone. My issue isn't with the sound or the Bluetooth connectivity.

These headphones, as other solos are, are built cheap. The sound coming out is great but the design is made out of plastic and i wouldn't recommend anyone going to the gym with these. Get the power beats if you're going to the gym. These feel like they will break and I have a feeling they will If I drop them hard enough. The ear cups re great leather quality and feel comfortable. I wish they went away with the plastic and made all the models like the beats pro were. The material in the design definitely needs work.

The Bluetooth connectivity is marvelous with this W1 chip. The range is insane. I went outside my house and down the street and was still connected without interuption. i don't understand everyone saying connecting is any different. Yes there's a pop up that says connect but all my other bluetooth headphones automatically connect after the initial set up anyway so I don't get this "amaazing set up" everyone is talking about.

One more thing I would like to point out are phone calls. The phone calls are so crystal clear. No one can tell I'm using headphones which is hard with Bluetooth nowadays. All around these are a great buy and I would buy them again (not for $300 of course). Sound quality is great, cal quality is great, if you can get over the plastic buy these!
Save yourself a headache and get Bose instead of Beats. These Beats are slightly cheaper, but they're a lot less comfortable if you have a normal to large sized head.
Got these for my wife. They are lightweight, comfortable to wear, they sound amazing, and the battery life is THE BEST PART. If you can afford these headphones, get them! Seriously...get them.
Perfect! I have a pair of these that I recieved as a gift. I love them, so I bought a pair for my husband. He loves them. We use them everyday. The quality is excellent and the sound is great.

Good sounding headphones, just didn't like the fact they look bulky on your head, meaning they stick out really far. They don't cover your whole ear like the Studio's do. They are also I bit tight if you don't have a small head. Other than that , they work well.

comfortability - 3 quality of product - 7
Awesome sound, very comfortable, easily syncs with my phone. So much better than my old headphones. Wish I had bought two so my wife would stop stealing them.

I’ve onky fully charged this set of headphones once since I bought them. I’ve taken them to the gym at least 30 minutes maybe 8-10 times and haven’t had to recharge them. They fit pretty comfortably and don’t really squeeze to tight. They sound great except not as loud as a previous set that I own. Th bass is not where near what it used to be. But over all still pretty good
Can’t pull these off my child’s head. It’s an everyday accessory. She loves them. Great sound and battery life. Comfort is there as well.

I was so worried if these were real or fake beats especially given the reviews...however I received real genuine beats in an unopened package...delivery was fast and so far the sound quality and battery life are great.

You get caught on the name, and think is a great product, but are OK. A little too heavy, a few hours on your head you want to take them off. BOSE are much lighter , The sound is good, and it syncs with my iPhone easily.
The battery is literally always dead. Always. Does not last the advertised 40hrs. Wish I could send them back. Of course the sound is great, but please fix the power supply.
The headphones themselves look pretty premium, the rose gold and white combination look great, and the bass and subwoofer are what you'd expect from a Beats product.

They go the extra mile selling fake beats. I would recommend just buying these at best buy. The packaging and design match the authentic beats almost perfectly, with minor discrepancies. But i believe they are fake because the W1 chip it is supposed to have didnt connect to my ipad air 2 like advertised, and the comfort of these headphones werent the same as the ones i wore in store at best buy. And the sound quality was pathetic, my cheap asus laptop has better sound than these.

So I know everyone is seeing all these one star reviews and how they’re fake and too cheap and stuff however, I checked the serial number, and everything was in check and these are indeed 100% real beats. I just got them today and I also saw others have trouble 4 months down the road. If anything happens In the next 4 months, I’ll probably take this review down or just add on but bottom line is that the beats I received were in fact real beats
I love these and wear them every day at work! I wear them when I grocery shop- when I run errands and when I’m in the waiting room at the Dr’s office

These are great over the ear headphones. I didn't want to jump on the iPod craze as I was afraid I would misplace them, but also do not like the "in ear" feel. These are comfortable and they fold so that they are easy to store and transport when not in use.

Ouch! Maybe just me, and maybe I have a large head, but these things were very painful after wearing for only 15 minutes. Thankfully, I was able to return them without a hassle. Otherwise, the sound quality was excellent.

Had them a few weeks now. Could not be happier. I was apprehensive about buying them as I’ve never had really nice headphones before but they’re a fantastic product. Easy pairing. Great sound quality. Not noice cancelling but very good sound quality & overeat gives all I need in this department. Super long battery life. Comfortable. The case is sleek & provides good protection.

Definitely the best investment in headphones I have ever made. The quality in sound is absolutely amazing. They are also very comfortable and just nice to look at. The carrying case is great to have when traveling and also keeps them from getting dusty when you’re not using them. Overall if you want great quality sound and performance, you will want these headphones.

I love everything about these headphones, except for the built-in mic. When receiving or making phone calls, the person on the other line can barely hear me because the mic picks up all surrounding sounds. Wish Beats would fix this!
I typically wouldn't ever spend more than $40 on a pair of headphones but I LOVE my breasts so much. I just them for the gym and not only is the quality amazing but the fit is great as well.

After 1 month of having my first pair, the battery stopped charging. When I tried to charge them, no light would light up and when trying to turn them on a red light would blink. Since they were still under warranty I returned them and they gave me new pair. About 13 months later (right when the warranty expired), the battery stopped charging again. When I went to Apple to get them fixed they were going to charge me $126!!! Save yourself from some trouble and just buy another brand.
After farther review, I found that these headphones only cover the ear and not over the entire ear. After receiving this set, I returned it back to Amazon without opening the box.
Good headphones. I have to use over ear headphones because earbuds make my head hurt. These are a great trade off and the Bluetooth works really well
I love these and they are the best gift to myself ever
Headphones sound amazing. But they do not last too long. They break down quickly. Muffs may fall off, and the sound may stop working abruptly. get a warranty.
right side stopped working after 8 months of using them at my desk...
Within 6 months of getting them the charged section stopped working. Had them replaced and the same thing happened again. I wouldn't ever buy Beats ever again. Not worth the price.
Fun set of headphones. Great sound quality.

The sound is amazing and they're so comfortable! I think these are the best headphones I've ever had.

IMPORTANT NOTE: You should get a hard case to store them.

Some months after the purchase, the left headphone just stopped working when connected to bluetooth, but it worked perfectly fine when I used the 3,5mm jack. Luckily, I managed to get some new ones from Apple.

My guess is that storing them in the provided fabric bag harmed somehow the wiring, since the headphones barely fit in it.

Works great with apple products. Husband uses them to work out, run (and they stay on), now the lawn, etc.

Phone calls come through clear also.

No complaints.
Great product for the price! Very serviceable headphones for TV, PC and music. Easy bluetooth connection and nice case and cables

Conectado con el cable, parece ser que se activan los controles de alguna manera, no lo he probado mas conectado. La batería dura y dura como ninguno que haya tenido. El sonido es muy bueno. My boyfriend lost his old beats -_- he needed a new pair of headphones before our trip to the DR so he ordered these hoping they would be great even though he was skeptical of them being wireless but he loves them. No complaints. No issues.

Daughter had same pair before but somehow they got sat on and broke. So got these as replacement because they are amazing.

This was bought for my youngest daughter. My other 3 children owned some & all loved them. She is happy with the color, despite not being her first choice. I can say that these headphones last, as my girls have had them for years.
LOVE THESE SO MUCH. Perfect for yoga or the gym. They don’t slide off, they block most noises and the music sounds great.
Great headphones but I can only turn my headphones up to half volume before others can hear my music so if your looking for high volume noise canceling headphones look elsewhere.
Bought these for my 14 year old son for Christmas. Best Gift EVER!!! My son loves these head phone. Wears it 24/7 (typical teenager). Quality is great. Price is amazing.

Super awesome headphones!! Bought these for my daughter end of February 2017– she has used them eevvvverrryyyydaayyyyy for HOURS since... work perfectly, sounds is amazing... highly recommend them!! Actually going to be buying another pair for our other daughter for Christmas!
Got them for my girlfriend for her birthday and she loves them! They look and sound great! Might even have to buy a pair for my self! Definitely recommend!

Bought them as a Christmas gift for my daughter. She seems to enjoy them, perhaps a little too much. No complaints from her.

I am very happy with these and I get a ton of compliments on this edition of my Beats. They did not come with a charger or the cord pictured, which wasn't a deal breaker for me once I got them but it could be for someone else. I would definitely recommend these.

This was a gift but I got the silver/white ones for myself. Absolutely the most comfortable set of headphones I've ever used. Great isolation from outside noise (like on a plane), great sound quality and battery life. Easy pairing and use with an iPhone.
I returned them. I thought they would be noise cancelling (especially for the price). They are not. They were uncomfortable and sound quality was sub-par. I suggest the Cowin headphones instead.

love the headphones bought them for all my long summer flights on the planes....but the cord to plug into the TV on the plane stopped working after one use. Contacted Apple and they replaced but only had sound in one ear all the way home on a 5 hour flight. Hope the next time I use them I don't have this issue again!!

Don't buy these. These are the second pair I've gotten and they both stopped working in the same way. The first pair worked for about 2 weeks then it started having issue with charging and connecting wirelessly. Amazon replaced them and after a few more weeks, the same issue has come up. Now the 2nd pair doesn't charge properly or connect wirelessly. Too much money to spend on headphones that malfunction so easily.
My 3 year old Beats by Dre finally gave up. So i purchased this new SOLO one. I am glad this one has more hours for listening.

These headphones are super cute, and work well. If you're planning on using these to workout you should be aware of the pros and cons.
Pros: You can put your phone down and not have to worry about dropping it.
Cons: When you sweat, they slip off your head and the pads get squishy.

Love this product. My only issue is the bluetooth doesn't pair as well with computers that aren't Apple products. Sometimes after wearing them for an extended period of time my ears do start to ache a bit. Overall, the sound quality is great and the battery life is amazing.

The Beats Solo3 is definitely better than the Solo2, but i still feel these headphones pinch my ears, which makes it a bit painful for someone who wears glasses. If I didn't wear glasses, I would probably buy it again 10/10.

Best headphones I own! The sound quality is amazing. If you're in the market for wireless over the ear headphones, these are the ones. It also has a wire to hook them up directly to your device, if you run out of battery.

So comfortable to wear because they don't slip around on my head. The only thing that I don't like is how hot my ears get while I'm wearing them. But, I thought that might happen with the full ear coverage. It is worth it to have such great sound while I'm walking, out doing yard work, or working. On top of all that, I love the color. They're pretty!
These are so perfect for travel at cutting out the external noise so I can hear what I really want to be listening to!
I love the headphones they’re by far the best purchase I’ve made, very comfortable and the sound is pure. Awesome!
Good sound. Don’t like the way it feels on my ears. Recommend Bose headphones. Much much better fit, sound, noise cancellation and comfortable.

Cons:
Uncomfortable after long wear
Doesn't turn on when not connected to source directly

Great that I received someone else's used beats... I was a little skeptical when the box was not even wrapped. When I opened it, the headphones were scratched up and the cups had earwax in them. Absolutely unlike Amazon to send used beats when they are marked as new. When I paired to the device, it already pops up as Christian's beats solo 3. So Christian, absolutely brilliant but you need to clean your ears. As if that wasn't enough, the left ear just did not work at all. Very disappointed. Save yourself the trouble, buy these at best buy for the same price.

Received these today and they are difinently not beats. They are the cheapest knock off I can imagine. No power button, no volume buttons, no charging port and no markings of beats at all. I would not buy these with the chance of paying $220 for a product you aren't sure you are receiving. To bad makes me question amazon
Every since Apple has purchased beats this product has been garbage. I have purchased four pairs of beats in a year. The same issue: one speaker goes out. This is only after 2 months.
Awesome for the price!! They still slip when sweaty at the gym, but the sound is great and since I bought them on Amazon Prime Day I got a killer deal!

The headphones lasted me almost 11 months. Went out on me from the right side. As far as noise cancellation, it lacks that. Durability is good as many times as I dropped them. Is it worth the price? No. The sound doesn’t sound worth $150. They only charge because they have a name. For $150 they could of fixed up the bass. I’m a bass lover and there wasn’t too much bass for me out of these headphones.
The batteries last at least a week. The sound is great. The build is strong. Love the look and over all, fantastic.

Got these bad boys during a amazing Amazon sale. Head phones work great. Love the look of these. The sound is very good but not great (get Bose for that). Would i get these at full price? Probably not but under $200 sign me up!
Got these for the kids. Quality and build is nice, but honestly surprised at how much better Bose is then these.

I love these headphones! They're gorgeous and sleek just like I wanted and the sound quality is great! Of course they're a little on the pricier side, but this pair I actually found for the best price without needing to take the risk of getting a refurbished one. I would definitely recommend getting these from Amazon or at least showing this listing to Target so they can price match for you!
very nice music is awesome almost like being there
Ummm idk about the negative comments...these Beats are NOT fake...i brought them to Apple Store & they are authentic...sound is amazing!! My daughter loves them
Muy bueno
Came with broken plug in microphone set. Wouldn’t let me return. Too small for my ears. Doesn’t cancel out much noise and volume is not very loud for the “beats” label in my opinion.

Easily the best headphones I’ve ever had, both in sound and durability. Not to mention the controls on the left side give all the controls you need to be handsfree! I wore them to work 5 nights a week for over two years before any problems. I felt like I got my money’s worth and bought a second pair!
You can never go wrong with Beats. My husband is very happy working in the garage on his toys, Beats on his headand off he goes.. Great Choice. Shipping and all was great Service .. Thanks
They came in new packaging, they’re not refurbished. They sound incredible, and improvements to the material have made it far more durable than the original Beats headphones.

I gave it overall 2 stars because the headphones were working great. Then 6 months after i got them the Bluetooth feature stopped working. That was one of the reasons i bought them. They are mock off beats the paint also started coming off. I am so close to returning them.
It's 1 year July 2019 to July 15,2020. It's not charging. It has warranty for 3 years. Please email let me knew. Send me alother.
Gifted my son with these and he loves them. Definitely can't hear anything outside of the headphones and the hearing quality is great.

I'm no expert, but these things are nothing short of awesome...and I don't mind paying for awesome. They remind me of my favorite set of Koss headphones back in my high school / Pink Floyd days.
Very comfortable, great sound, and the level of tech is simply amazing.

I’m very active and cannot wear those tiny ear buds (my ears are small and they just don’t fit right). These headphones paired instantly with my iPhone 10. Super stylish! I wear them running, weightlifting and even for travel.

In love! I like how it pairs so easily with my iPhone and I’m particularly fond of the sound quality. The microphone is super clear - it picks up whispers and talking from people across the room. Such a great product and a great value!

The sound was great and all but the headphones just felt a little used. Shipping was fast though but I'm going to have to ask for a refund. I bought these for my girlfriend and my sister has the same ones; these didn't very much look the ones my sister got from best buy.

I have been using these headphones at the gym every day for a couple months now and the headphones have gotten loose to the point that I have to hold them in place if I am doing anything like looking down... a bit disappointed as I have taken extremely careful care of them and always put them back in case when not in use.
The only problem I have with these headphones is the fact that I cannot wear them to the gym. They simply do not stay on if you are not sitting or standing in an upright position.

My lady wanted them so I bought them. she seems to love them over the one the Sony's wireless that I bought her. She said that these are more stylist, sound better and the rose gold definitely looks better. Happy wife happy life right? To me they look good they sound good and for $245 well she's happy LOL

About his beats headphones for my daughter! They are very expensive but the quality of the headphone is worth every penny. They are Bluetooth or you can actually hook up the auxiliary cord! When you have these headphones on you can cancel everything around you very high-quality sound!
These are AMAZING!!!! Love them!!!
After only one use, only able to hear sound in one ear. Looked online and this is a frequent occurrence with these headphones.
These work great but check out the other products before spending $300 on these. My sony wired $20 headphones sound just as good. Classic example of paying too much for a brand name.
Absolutely love my these. I use them in the gym all the time. The stay on my head for the most part when I am doing HIIT or Crossfit workouts which is great.

Had less than a year and the black inner ear portion is wearing off and the white foam is exposed. The headphones are are also very stretched out and dont stay on very well. Disappointed they are falling apart considering they are not used that often and were very expensive!

Stylish and comfortable fit. Not the best sound quality by any means, but not a three star pair of headphones. I love that you can call and answer calls with them. Very convenient. Would definitely recommended them ESPECIALLY if they are on sale.

THE best piece of personal audio equipment I have ever owned. The W1 chip and the flat-frequency response pave way to long distance connectivity and BEAUTIFUL sound. They are expensive...if you can swallow the price, you won;t have any buyer's remorse. Simple incredible.

Bought these for my fifteen year old daughter. They are very soft and comfortable on the ears, and do an excellent job of noise cancellation. She is able to concentrate on her school work while being surrounded two crazy loud brothers. They last a LONG, LONG time before needing to be charged. She uses them daily and needs to charge only about once a week. Great quality!

I know that these aren’t the cheapest headphones on the market, but you definitely get when you’re paying for! The sound quality is phenomenal and the battery life is amazing! I love them and use them everyday and only need to charge them every 3-4weeks.
These sound great and bluetooth works well, but they seriously clamped my head like a vise with my glasses on. I could no longer take it and purchased another brand instead.

Should have gone with competitor’s product.
Had to stretch out for almost a month to avoid pain from being too tight. Sound quality is not as stellar as advertised.

Was very very upset and disappointed with this purchase. The color of the headphones did not match with the ones in the box. The box that it was was in looked like it had been ran through the st. And they were missing the auxiliary cord and charging cord in the box. Horrible experience never ordering from again.

This is my first ever time buying BEATS, and let me tell you, I am very impress not only with the quality of sound and the overall great look of the head phones, but mostly because of how much playing time you get of them this is my 3rd week of usage and I have not charge them yet, they still have low 30 %.

Highly recommended product
Great sound but a little too large for me yet too tight on my ears. Leaves my ears swollen and red after use. I think for the price, you can easily find better headphones.
Very disappointing. The sound quality is nothing special compared to cheap ear buds. It is also so tight and hurts, and i am 120 lb.
Great way to get the minions to listen to their music in private and they love them! High quality sound, great battery life, and "coolness" factor suitable for a pre-teen.

It's a great product. If you're into noise cancellation headphones, these are a really great buy. I ordered rose gold but the color is just a tad bit off. Other than that no complaints. They do require to be charged when you get them because they don't come fully charged. Sound quality is awesome, especially if you're into bass. These headphones get really loud, so that's another plus.

I was excited after purchasing my Beats solo 3 wireless headphones . But l am very disappointed that after one year they broke, and l was looking for a top quality product , so the right speaker had not sound...l took it to best buy and they told me and it was no way to fix it . After spending a lot of money it breaks down it less than 2 years.
Perfect
Love these. The sound is so crisp and just so clear. Quality headphones.

Bought for my daughter for Christmas 2016. We travel quite a bit and is so nice on the road, flights, everywhere. Works everywhere, everytime. Want to get myself one, but a bit pricey for me. Hopefully price will come down.

These are the second pair of beats I have purchased, and they are great. I know they get a lot of complaints by music professionals as not being "the" top quality music output. However, to my amateur ears, I think that they are perfectly fine. The battery lasts forever....I usually have to charge them only every 2-3 weeks, and use them almost every day. Compared to pretty much any other rechargeable product, their battery life is amazing. I don't know how many long haul flights I have planned, and the morning of realized that I had forgotten to charge my ipad/computer...etc. These headphones are great, since they last so long. The music quality is more than sufficient for me, and the fact that they fold up means I can throw them in my purse pretty easily. I use them on my commute, for travel, and when I work out! Great product.

Item worked for a few months. Now they will not ppwer on and stay on. Upon trying to regoster for support unable to do so. I do not see help offered from Amazon site for assistance. Since beat is a apple product usually they will assist if you can prove you purchased within past year. Beats and Aplle are good companies for thier products. I will not cut corners anymore to purchase them however.
Haven’t had any issues yet!

Very nice headphones. The color style stands out. My son gets lots of compliments. Had initially purchased these headphones for my 11 year old but they were a little small. Gave this pair to my 8year old and purchased the Studio'S for my 11 year old and everyone is happy. Cancels sound, quick and easy connectivity, plays music with a crisp sound and the superior look makes this a great purchase. Fast and quick delivery.
I love my solo 3's rose gold, they are so lit and the Bluetooth is the best part. Don't share with your friends 💯🎶😂🎧

I use this for intense, mobile, jumping work outs. Doesn't fall of my head. Sound is loud enough, but I wish it could get louder for when I am in loud atmosphere. Quality is fine, nothing to rave about.

Good product. Just not sure why I paid over $200 for headphones.

Make sure you ensure you are buying the condition you want (new/used). I bought the new ones, they are so nice. Smells like the beloved interior of a brand new car! Easy connect with my Samsung S6 & all the controls work well (answering call with headphones, volume, etc..). Comfortable & the matte black looks nice. And of course the sound is amazing!!
Sound quality is great, but they hurt my ears because of how they are positioned directly on ear. Should have gone with the Studio3.
What more needs to be said, these beats are awesome! Great price on prime day. I’m glad I waited. I’ve been wanting these for a long time.
We had a very happy kid when he opened these up! They work better than we could have ever imagined!
Bought for my daughter- they’re great! Easy to use, comfortable, sturdy. Long lasting battery. Expensive but worth it.

Unfortunately, I am going to return these, and for one simple reason: Even with a full charge, the headphones shut off after being in the cold for as little as 15 minutes. And I'm not talking about arctic temps, I'm merely outside in mid-20's degrees, and the battery shuts down. I looked at the beats website and other sites, and this is a well-known design flaw. If you are solely in warmer climates, then the headphones may be for you (they sound great). Otherwise, be warned.
I bought these for my 13 year old son and he loves them. Quality is very good, sound is awesome. I also love that he got a carrying case with it also.

Gift for a 9 yr old. First my grand daughter hugged the box, then she open them, put them on and we lost her for the rest of the entire night. LOL She was very happy with this product. Got them to match her Mommy’s. Happy camper. Sound is superb.
damn thing stopped playing out the right side after 3 months. THREE months. piece of crap! And then the hinge on one side broke so they are useless.
These are awesome! Very clear, cancel out others quite well! 😂. They’re small, hold a charge for along time! Love them
Una buena opción de audífonos para el gimnasio, para correr y otras actividades. La batería tiene buena duración.

At this price the charge should last 12 years. Otherwise, my daughter never lets them out of her site. The noise cancellation is superb because when she get all tweeny on they go, then off my mouth goes.
Legit real brand new beats. I think they was open box. Still had plastic on them never used and came with everything
Bought these for my daughter months ago. I am really impressed with the quality. She loves them.

These headphones are absolutely worth the price. The sound quality is phenomenal, and is great for anything from working out to studying. The battery life is also amazing. The only reason I would rate this product a 4, and not higher, is because if I wear them for too long they start to hurt my head from the position. This could just be a personal problem.
Great headphones - comfortable, noise cancelling and excellent bass response - recommend these
Best wireless speakers I’ve ever owned. Battery life is AMAZING!! charges up quickly as well. Love the fit. The sound quality is amazing. Great great gift idea.

I obviously bought this pair of headphones for the appearance, and it doesn’t disappoint. But the sound is meh, and they squeeze my head like a vice grip, so I can’t say I don’t have some regrets. I wish there was a way to relax the tension on the headband so it’s not so tight.

I love them. Easy to pair with my car and Android phone. Beautiful. Expensively made. A little tight at first but better tight than lose for years of wear because the leather may give in time and you don't want them falling off. Sound quality could use improvement. Base versus treble and clear ness.

6 months after purchasing the product new, one side stopped working. Amazon is the seller and they had purchased this product from Apple the year before, so we learned that the warranty wouldn’t cover it and the cost to repair ($300) was twice the purchase cost ($160). I guess next time we purchase the extra warranty, research it more, or purchase a product that will last more than 6 months.

These are amazing, beautiful headphones!! I had the wired solos before and they somehow seemed louder to me, but oh well, still love these. They’re so comfortable! Wish I could boost the loudness somehow though..
Good headphones. Some of the material came off the earbuds part but nothing is wrong with the quality of the headphones.
This must have been the 3rd headset I've bought within a 2-year span and, this is by far the best headset I've ever had in my entire life.

Had these beats for only about a year old and the right side just completely stopped working. No sound or anything. You would think something of this price would match in quality. Very disappointed in this product.

These fell apart in less than a year. I know they were well loved but for the price they should have lasted. A 13 year old tending to them. Not a young kid. I’m sure he’s a little rough but there is no reason the blue tooth function stopped working early on. Then the actual pieces on the ear cuffs started to fall off. Disappointing

Fits great. Battery power is unbelievable. 2 full days and they’re still going.
I can drown out all the kids!
❤️
Wow the left ear doesn't work after 2 months. what a waste of my money please don't waste your time.

Bought them for the wife so I haven't used them personally but she raves about them. She says she's been over the whole house and they haven't dropped/cut out once. Sound quality is excellent and they are very comfortable to wear (I've tried them on and they are quite literally "on-ear" as you can feel them rest on your ears). Seem to fit a little smaller than the average headphone which is great as they fit smaller heads. Battery life is as advertised.
Sound quality and size are perfect I just don’t like how my hair always gets stuck in the crevices and pulls

Can you please replace my beats Solo 3 wireless on earphone cause ther some damage in the right folding and its seems it's not tightly in close and it's loose but every thing is fine the sound is perfect the only problem is that right folding area please help mo for this and I'm your valid costumer always looking for something to buy but this is the first time I'm requesting for replacement
Gift for someone. They loved it
I gave them to my 12 year old grandson, he loved them so much his Dad wanted to take them! Great sound for the price.
Gorgeous headphones but they hurt when I'm wearing them because they press against my ears. Gives me a headache. I don't recommend. The bigger ones are way more comfortable.
Love, love, love these. I use them during my walks, running in the treadmill and sometimes just to block out sound around me.
As much as these headphones cost, you would think they would be more sturdy. First the covers on the cushions started coming off. Then they stopped working. Waist of over $220!
I've had these for a while, and just started using them more because I'm travelling a lot more. I like them, but after an hour the ears get sore. And I have a pretty small head.

My daughter loves these! She has had other headphones previously however, nothing compares to the wireless Beats in terms of quality and comfort. The sound quality is great and the feel on your ears is very comfortable. Purchasing a hard carrying case is a must to ensure these are kept protected at all times.

Earpiece is a little tight...and I have pretty small ears, but the noise reduction is good. Just can’t wear them for more than an hour which can be a little tough if watching a movie.
Beautiful color!
These headphones work really well and have great sound. The rose gold is a great color.

I love these headphones. My husband can be watching tv or playing his guitar and I don’t hear it. On an airplane the engine is barely audible. The battery life is amazing and having Mickey on them is just a plus! I can use my iPhone or iPod with them as it comes with a wire! I like the fact that old music or new the sound and volume level is the same!
Bought these to replace the ones I left on a plane. Perfect for me since I can’t use ear buds

They were my Mother’s Day gift.
I loved them.
3 months later I was using them one day and I tried turning them off.
They never turned off till they ran out of battery
Once the battery ran out I tried charging them and they wouldnt charge.
I’ve tried resetting them and everything apple tells me to do so far nothing’s worked:(
Before buying these I was skeptical about all the hype but these headphones are absolute quality. They live up to the hype! Sound quality is amazing. Worth the money.

I have had beats since the first Solo On-Ear Headphones came out. Since then, they have much improved on overall quality and comfort. So far my favorite is the Beats Solo3, though price-wise the original Solo cannot be beat. (the Solo2 was a disaster)

This headphones 🎧 rock. Deep bass. Clear treble. The best sounding headphones I have ever used. They are comfortable for extended wear. They have a 40 hour battery. I can’t say enough. Worth every penny.

We've loved these headphones, but the bluetooth stopped working on one side after 4 months of use. We've taken very good care of them, and they are great headphones, but for the price I planned on them lasting a lot longer than 4 months. The headphones still work with the cord ... but that kind of defeats the purpose of getting wireless headphones.
Loved it

Quality of sound is amazing. This is the second pair I’ve owned (first pair was stolen out of car). I was determined to replace them. Finally did and frankly a little disappointed in the actual hardware. It’s been a month, haven’t a used them too much, I usually need the smallest size setting but this pair is slightly defective, the left side doesn’t stay “closed” even when being worn. Aside from defect disappointment of this pair, highly recommend the brand.

While the sound quality is pretty good, the craftsmanship is absolute garbage. Within two months of owning mine, the leather on the ears was falling off and the carrying case has a wonky zipper. I do like them, but you can get much higher quality headphones for a similar price.

These are so awesome. I really wanted wireless headphones that would stay put while I was working out, and these do a beautiful job with that. So, I can work out, listen to amazing quality sound, and never re-adjust. I could get all technical and specific but I think that says it all!! They're pricey but so worth it! Added bonus, they look pretty too <3
This product does not work and I need to return. Only buy from Apple store
I really really really (yes 3x) love these headphone. perfect - love - great - good - amazing. I am using with my iphone and they sound great --- battery lasts forever.

I seriously wanted to love these.
Even using different EQ settings it just didn't have the quality of sound I've found from less expensive Bluetooth headphones. They have great battery life and range, but if you like to hear bass like, like a bass chello. Forget it. Even in deep bass EQ. it's a no go.
Just very unimpressed. Not at all what I expected or hoped for. Returning these.
Its an amazing headphone but the ear piece was to small for me and kept hurting my ears so exchanged it for a different beats

Apple has a problem with the batteries in their headphones. I've bought 4 pairs of them either for myself or as gifts and 2 of them have had the same battery failure issue. Eventually they just stop charging. Then you have to drive into the Apple store, wait in line, have them send them out, and drive back. Fortunately they often get stolen before they fail. That's about the best feature. The sound is good when they work. Would never buy another pair.
Got them for my son. He obviously can’t hear me when he’s wearing them. I literally have to walk over to him and tap him to get his attention.
Really great price on Amazon for this. These are going for $300+ everywhere else. I bought them for a low price, plus an additional 15% off with an Amazon coupon.

I'm loving these wireless headphones! Audiophiles complain about the sound quality but it sounds good to me and I listen to classical (think booming Wagner) to rock. The only drawbacks are the price tag and the less than intuitive controls. It comes w a storage bag which is nice for travel.
Update after a year of light use:. It's literally falling to pieces. Horrible build quality. Audio quality was great while it lasted. Expected a lot more durability at this price point.
A great buy !!! Bought for traveling on planes and it’s fantastic. Would totally buy again. So compact !!!
Great value for an awesome product. Sound is really nice. Bought it for my 11y/o year daughter. Should have bought one for me. Perfectly new condition.

Sound was ok. (not great. The minimum you would expect of 2019). Unfortunately, When you try to watch a video (posted 7-23-19), everything lags. YouTube, Netflix, etc. Perhaps I received a defect in product, but if not do not buy this. You can find a much better deal arround 20-30$. Also, the beats 2 were better.
Great price with Amazon prime day!!!!!

huge bass enhancement ( you can definitely tell from side-by-side comparison with Beyerdynamic T51i ), quite a lot clamping force. can't wear it for longer than 1 hour .
sound quality is decent, it's not bad imo, small sound stage due to the on-ear fact, human vocal is mushy and not as clear as other headphones within this price range. it's a fun headphone and like it so far.

Ignore all the haters, these headphones sound incredible. The battery life on these things blow my mind. It seems like 20+ hours of battery life and they recharge very quickly. Connectivity is a breeze with any Apple product and I would imagine the same can be said for Android products as well.

My package arrived sooner than expected, well packaged, nice and sleek. Would've preferred a hard carrying case as opposed to the soft one it came with, other than that I'm definitely satisfied. Thank you.

Bought these September 2019 after owning previous beats headphones for 4+ years. Within a couple months I noticed connectivity issues; it would randomly disconnect from my phone mid convo. Most recently, (four days ago) there's been no sound coming from the right side and as of tonight it won't connect via Bluetooth to my phone/ laptop.

It took about five months for me to decide to finally get them, and one I did my mind became blown! They are worth the purchase if you have been thinking about buying them. Perfect for the gym and easy to keep clean if you care for them. I recommend buying some covers for the ears just to make a little more comfortable but honestly you don’t have to. (This isn’t paid!)- Ranessa
Not impressive at all, I returned them. I then purchased a pair of Cowin E7 for 1/3 of the price of the Beats, same quality to me.
Very pleased. I have some less expensive, wired headphones that sound a little better, but none more convenient for mobility. Elegant push button design works well even with gloves on, or a hood.
Great headphones, great sound quality. Bought during prime day and got them for 70% off
Can’t believe it took me this long before I bought these. If you love music you need these Kick ass Don’t get wet or sweaty
Did not come in original package but case, cords and headphones in excellent shape! Amazing quality! Charge lasts days of use, sound is excellent and comfortable!
I bought these for my son and he reports them as having great sound quality. I found them to be easy to use and they are very portable as they fold up and fit into a smaller case.
They are great if your sitting on your couch. They dont cancel any noise. If its below 45° the battery last 15-20 minutes max. They are $50-$70 headphones all day long.
Easy to sync with phone. I had another pair of wireless beats and they would pair then not. It was frustrating, always repairing the headphones in mid song. Great sound - as always.
Work well and has good sound. Comfort level not so good. Hot and sweaty way too fast. For the price I expected something more comfortable.
Last 2 years, ready to toss in the garbage 😡 I have to glue both side, for the price? Should less longer.
Our 12 year old bought them with his own money. And he loves them. He has them on all the time! Makes it hard to call him out of his room. Bahahaha.

Battery life on these is crazy good. Excellent bass on these headphones and very nice quality. Can get a bit uncomfortable on the ears when on for a couple hours but other than that they are excellent
I do not find the headphones comfortable. I have to take them off frequently. I have bose headphones that are a lot more comfortable.

Right speaker went out within 2 months after normal wear - no active wear (running, working out, etc.) They were fantastic - great sound - better than last edition, though did become uncomfortable after extended use. Still bass heavy but sound was much improved.

I, of course, did not get the 4-year protection plan. Have been burnt on beats buds, but figured wireless wouldn't experience the same shortage issue.
My daughter loves them. My daughter has them on while she does her homework and she’s in her own zone.
No charging cable was included, this was the in packaging original most expensive version. Description stated all components included.

I like the light weight of the headset, the color which match my phone, did not know that when I ordered them, the sound is great, easy to connect and they are great for the gym. I do recommend them to whom would like to order them. Plus the battery last very long for use, so glad I ordered them

it works so good, my son enjoys doing his home work, listing to his music while I read a book.

I purchased this as a birthday gift for my girlfriend. She loves the sound quality of the headphones. She commented that she can now hear the tiniest background sounds while listening to podcasts.
Would never pay the $299. But I got them for 219.00!!! That's a price I can live with... I love these beats... I've had every generation and these are by far the best.

very easy to connect to my phone

great for running

Purchased for my autistic daughter and she loves it, perfect fit! Not heavy!

good product, on time and the features that I commented in the description

stop working on three different occasions - not over or undercharged. I have headphones that cost $14 from Walmart and never stopped working. Very Disappointed in an Apple brand! Sending back for a new pair or refund at $200 - are you kidding.

Battery life is great hardly ever have to charge. Also very good sound and durable.

Gift for my 13 yo and she couldn't be happier. Good price - I looked around - and works perfectly. She has commented on how easy they are to use, how they connect immediately, are so comfortable, etc. They look great, too. Very happy all around.

Bought this as a birthday gift for a friend 2 months ago and he STILL cannot stop thanking me for how great of a gift it is. He says the battery life is amazing and apparently can go 2 days without charging. And it’s also great for blocking out unwanted noises.... or people lol

Sound qaulity is very good and has a nice balance. The battery life is excellent and charges for the length advertised. The material qaulity is pretty good but not perfect. I guess they wanted a light feeling headset so it would be more comfortable. I would highly recommend buying this.

Love these things to death. My favorite headphones and the print on them is nice and crisp. I take good care of them and so far they haven’t chipped or cracked. Had them for about a year

I purchased these as a gift to my son for his 18th birthday. Needless to say, I got all smiles!!

Generally I wouldn't spend as much on headphones, but in this case they are worth every penny!

Really like these. They fit a little tight (and I don’t think I have a big head) but the tight fit makes them cancel out most outside noises. And I love being able to increase or decrease volume or pause what I’m listening to right from the headset.

Don’t get me wrong, these are good headphones. No issues connecting to my iPhone ever. Build quality is good. But sound wise? Your paying for the brand name. Nothing more. Good headphones, but not $300 good.

Amazing product! Love the wireless function. The only thing is when you’re working out you’ll be even more hot because the ears get really hot. But that’s obvious. The battery lasts me for like a week as I only use them for about an hour a day. Love it!

Very happy with these! Only tiny downside is the chrome right around where the charging port inserts chipped and broke the first few weeks. Minor cosmetic issue though. Battery lasts friggin forever! I listen for an hour at the gym everyday and only charge about once a month.

just what i needed. perfect for my office so i have the freedom to get up and move without being tied up with wires.

My wife loves these. As soon as she turns them on, something clicks inside her head that makes her clean the whole house in one fair swoop. If you are looking for complaints, there are none here.

Highly recommend this product. The description is conservative with respect to the battery life. Much longer than 40 hours. Quality exceeded our expectations as well noise cancellation. You can use on a loud airplane while traveling and hear nothing but the sweet sound of music/audio.

good sound quality easy use good batty life overall quality product

Great sound and I live the rose gold color. The case however is too small for the headphones and it's a struggle to get them in and out
Beats headphones are wonderful. They were exactly as order

It was a very good for a few months and then can no longer charged. The battery can last almost for a week and wireless is neat! Sound quality is okay. He brought them to college with him and claims to use them often. He is very happy with them

Wanted a decent pair of wireless headphones after always catching a cord at work and breaking other pairs. I looked at a few pairs, these, some Bose headphones and some V-Moda. Honestly these probably had the lowest reviews of the 3. Not bad reviews, but lower than the other two in general so I was hesitant. I also had never read great things about older Beats, but they came down in price some to about 70 less than the other two so I decided to give it a shot.

I am pleasantly surprised. I am by no means an audiophile so that may help, but I think they sound very good. Pretty full sound, I don't think it's the best by any means, but it's a good sound and enjoyable to listen to. Range also seems really good on the bluetooth.

As far as comfort. They definitely could be tight to some. They kind of clamp down on the ears. I don't find this bad, but it's definitely something to consider in a purchase. I think overall they are very comfortable so far. A little hot under the ears after a bit maybe, but not bad.

I would recommend them if you want a decent pair of wireless headphones. Good sound, easy to pair, comfortable. Oh, and it also came with 30 bucks on the itunes store or 3 months of apple music. Since I will use that it's like I saved another 30 bucks on them which really makes them a great deal.

Heads-up - this is a lengthy review - but when you are considering a headphone at this price you deserve as much review as you can get to help you decide! I will rate by topic so you can also focus on what is most important to you. Let's start with context. These are my first Beats headphones - wired or wireless. They are not of course my first wireless or wired headphones. I have several wireless headphones including Jabra Move and Jaybird BlueBuds X. I also have several wired headphones with my favorites being KEF M500 (on ear) and Oppo PM-2 (over ear). My sound preference in a headphone is crisp and clear highs and mids with a presence and "definition" of bass - but not over done. Yea, I'm not a bass-head. So here we go...

WIRELESS (5 / 5):
Right off the bat, this is where these headphone excel, and why I considered and bought them in the first place. They are by far the easiest bluetooth headphones I have used to pair and manage with multiple devices. This of course assumes you are very deep in the Apple eco-system - which I am. I use these headphones with an iPhone, iPad and MacBook. Initial pairing was simple and automatic with my iPhone - place it next to it, turned it on, hit accept and done. Then in seconds the headphone showed up in all my Apple devices! And switching between what device is connected and active is just as easy. I could never get previous wireless headphones I owned to play nice with multiple devices even though they supposedly supported this feature. One wireless headphone always went back and forth between my iPhone and iPad even when I was in the middle of listening to music on my iPhone. Not so with the Solo3! And the range and battery life are incredible. I have owned my Solo3 for over a week and I am still on the initial charge. So hands down wireless performance is the best feature of these headphones.

COMFORT (4 / 5):
The Solo3 is an on-ear headphone and for me they are actually quite comfortable. The leather pads are comfortable and seal well - though they are not as soft as the pads on my KEFs. But maybe they will soften over time. The "clamping" of the Solo3 is firm and keeps the headphones very stable during moderate activity but not so tight that they bother my ears at all. The headband liner is comfortable for me too - I don't seem to have the rubbing problem some people have mentioned. And the plastic construction (see again under quality) actually has one plus in that it keeps the headphones light. I almost don't notice they are on my head until... The good seal and firm/thick pads cause my ears to heat up after about 30 mins so I do have to take them off for short "cool-down" breaks.

QUALITY (3 / 5):
This is a hard one to judge short term so my rating here is certainly preliminary. Bottom line - admittedly there is a lot of plastic here. Yes, it is a plus under comfort as it keeps the headphones light. But when you get in to this price range you defiantly see more metals and leathers and less plastic. And some wired headphones I have are so solid they have lasted me over a decade! I am not sure I will be able to say that about these headphones. And a 1 year warranty is not very confident - some headphones starting at this price point offer up to 3 years. It would certainly inspire confidence if Beats backed these a bit more and made me feel like the plastic construction was solid and truly there for comfort (weight). That said its too early to bash longevity yet.

SOUND (4 / 5):
Ok now the final and most subjective topic - the sound quality. Recall my sound preference - not a bass-head. When I first heard about these headphones with the new wireless chip - I was interested because of all the hassles I had before with bluetooth headphones. But because they were Beats I struggled to decide to purchase or not. I have not owned Beats because Beats headphones I listened to in the past were definitely too much bass for me - thudding and muffled. But I decided to give it a try - I could always return them. They are not going back! The sound is actually a pleasant surprise. Yes, they are more bass then what I own now - but they sound more balanced then what I remember. You can hear good mids and highs - though they are certainly more reserved. And the spatial separation is very good - these give a full and well spaced sound that makes you feel like you are indeed in the middle of the studio or concert. They excel with more Rock then Classical, so there still is a place for my wired headphones, but I also don't feel like I have to sacrifice sound quality to get wireless convenience.

OVERALL (4 / 5):
Overall, these are very good wireless headphones - they are now my primary go to wireless headphones for sound quality and convenience across all my Apple devices - though I am keeping my set of wireless Jaybirds for intense workouts only. They are even what I turn to now over my wired headphones for most music/podcasts unless I want to immerse myself in some Acoustic, Classical or Jazz where I still prefer my wired options. Value is good - plastic to price ratio is not ideal - but it is offset by the wireless simplicity and sound. If you want a no-compromise wireless experience, you should at least consider these headphones.

At this point I have had the headphones 4 months and now they won't connect to Bluetooth. I also tried to connect them to a PC for an update but they will not connect via USB. I have tried to reset the headphones but that didn't work either. In contact with Apple Support now. I was skeptical at first but I have bad no issues so far. Make sure to buy a hard case as well to keep them safe!! Stand by for a later update!

UPDATE:
Going on 2 months now and they are still running strong. I used them mainly for workouts, running, and plane rides. No issues that I can detect. These are worth the money!

9 month review!!! These are still amazing. No issues yet. Keep in mind these are beats and very fragile.

Be careful. These are advertised as new and sold by Amazon directly; however, when they arrived, they don't work at all. Did not pair initially, then once paired, it went back into pairing mode every 2-3 minutes and kept losing bluetooth. Would not turn on if it was not plugged in and would not do a software update. Contacted Apple for support and it turns out the serial number on the headphones do not match the serial number on the box they came in. Apple says according to the serial number on the device, they were purchased last fall and are NOT new and have already been reported as defective. I'm very angry after spending this much on headphones, I expect them to be new and defect free. Returning for a refund and will shop elsewhere.

When they worked, the sound quality was good, and it didn’t take long to charge. I bought them in August (gave them to my daughter in September for her birthday), and the mic cord came apart almost immediately - the mic cover came off). By January 1st, one side didn’t work. We’d gotten her a set of wired Beats a few years ago, and she treated them very well. The leather wore out around the ears, but there wasn’t a scratch, and she insisted they were still perfect. Because she was so good with them and used them so much, we surprised her with these wireless ones. The problems with the mic and one side were not caused by damage. The glossy finish is still in perfect condition, and she is meticulous with her things. I’m just so disappointed in the quality. The wired ones we bought a few years ago (3 sets) still work; so I guess we won’t be upgrading to wireless anytime soon.

This feels like a cheap backpack from the dollar store. The biggest problem was the Bluetooth. I just saw that they are $10 cheaper, and more trust worthy, straight from the store. 1/10, 0/10 if I could. Buyers Beware!!!!!

Beats Solo3 is not the best audio out there, but the crazy thing is that I find myself wearing them more often than another $500 pair of headphones that I have just because they are so convenient and easy. They fold up small and are easy to carry in a backpack, holding up well to pretty tough treatment. The battery lasts forever and if it does die, you can get a whole study session of juice for like 5 minutes of charging. Connecting to my MacBook, iPhone, or iPad is so easy using the M1 chip and the syncing of settings through iCloud that it makes connecting other bluetooth devices seem super cumbersome: Just turn the Solo3 and choose it from your list of devices (no need to disconnect from one device before connecting to the next). And finally, they look good and are very comfortable.

So even though they aren't the best headphones I own, they end up being the ones I use the most because of how convenient, tough, long-lasting, and easy they are. Even though I said the sound isn't the best, the sound is great. The only time that I can discern that they are inferior is head-to-head, and even then, for some types of music these are preferred. They are certainly tuned to handle bass quite well, but they aren't overly bass-heavy as some other reviews indicate. So the sound is more than passable, quite good, and even superior for some music.

A lot of people always seem to nitpick about about the items that they purchase off of Amazon. They always talk about how the sound quality could have been better, they always somehow find a reason that they think it's good enough to complain about the comfortability. Here's what I think about the beats that I bought:

They are one of the best headphones a person can ask for. I do not understand why people tend to complain about the comfortability when they have cushions for your ears. That's what's really important when it comes to wearing headphones that goes over your head. The sound quality is exactly what you would expect from a popular company. The sound quality is amazing along with the different colors that you can buy. When I first bought my headphones I had a question mark over my head because it wasn't turning on, but that was only because it needed to be charged. And that is the beauty of Beats Solo 3, if your headphones is dead, you can also still play music with the wires, just simply plug it in your phone and in your Beats.
I do not know if it is just me because due to the fact that I lost my other pair of Beats it's been such a long time since I touched it let alone wear it, they do seem to feel fragile, all the more reason to place a warranty on an item that happens to feel fragile. Now the question that everybody seems to be asking is "is it true that it only takes about 5 minutes to charge the headphones completely, and is it true that the battery life last up to 40 hours." Well the answer depends on how much you use your headphones. There is 5 LED lights that indicates the percentage of your battery of the headphones. If the LED light is on the third light, that just means that you are at least 50 to 75% of battery life left so in other words, it would take a roughly 5 to 10 minutes to charge it which isn't bad. But ultimately it is pretty fast when it comes to charging headphones especially when it turns out to be Wireless. The volume button Works along with the pause and play button, the button that turns on the wireless headphones work. It even makes that musical noise when you are officially connected to your device, and it does it again when you turn it off. I am able to extend the headphones. I am able to fold them which is a definitely a must for me because when I am finished with my headphones for the day I usually fold them.

In conclusion, if something happens to your headphone such as a shortage on the right or left side of the headphones, if you have a warranty all you have to do is just call Apple and they should be able to fix it either call Apple or whatever warranty you are affiliated with. In addition, if you have a computer or a laptop you should download this beat app where you able to update the headphones, I will not go into details but you could always look it up on your spare time. With that being said I'm giving this product and five star and whoever purchase it in the future, I can almost guarantee that you will enjoy what you bought. Not to mention that this was on sale because originally it was $300. Now in the beginning of my review I was talking about how people tend to nitpick and and complain about things that can be easily fixed. And I was very serious about that, they are the ones who bought the item off of Amazon if something happens to that item it doesn't take as much to file a complain and get a refund and get your money back after you give them back what has been broken. Since a lot of people gave it a one-star, I had to double think about me buying this. But when I purchased it it turns out to be great just as I was expecting, no issues to the point where I would want a refund.

Oh and by the way, the true difference between Beats Solo 3 wireless and Studio 3 is that studio 3 have the ability to cancel out noise, solo 3 although you are able to increase your volume the point where you are not able to hear a single thing from the outside world, there is still a chance where despite your volume being all the way up the environment that is around you could be louder than your music. So it is not fully a noise cancellation headphones. But these headphones are beneficial for me because I'm not always in an environment that is loud enough to where I have to blast it up to 100.

And this is where my review ends

Audio quality is amazing and the design is, of course, slick. However this is the second time I've made a Beats purchase, and I've decided I won't be purchasing anymore of their products. Maybe it's because I use headphones so much, but with both products, they lasted less than half a year before something went wrong. In this case, the cushion was coming apart, and I was having trouble connecting with my laptop several times. Sometimes it would disconnect out of the blue and I would have to restart my laptop to get it to connect again. They weren't very comfortable on my ears either, so I think I'd prefer an over-the-ear headphones because this one squishes down on mine. It's a shame because the audio really is amazing! And I love the design and color, but for this price, it's not worth buying, at least not for me.

Got 2 pairs at once for me and my girlfriend who use them all the time with our iPhones. I have an iPhone 7 and she has an iPhone 6. I love the new pairing tech apple has in the iPhone 7's and up and these headphones are just great. You can use wires if you want to, which I think maybe makes the base a little better, though I am not sure how accurate that is. Either way, I LOVE THESE headphones! One thing I am surprised about is the battery life on these things. I charge them once a week and often fall asleep with them on Audible and wake up to them still playing all night and still only charge about once a week. The battery life is amazing, the range is amazing, the weight and design, packaging and comfort is just all top notch. I thought the battery life might be due to the W1 chip in my iphone 7 which uses the same tech as the Air Buds, but my girlfriend who uses regular bluetooth with her iPhone 6 reports the same ridiculous battery life. She also says that she charges hers once or twice a week. These are easily the most comfortable beats thus far for over the ear. Head fatigue is almost non existent.

Item arrived on time and well packaged. This was my first ever Beats product and I absolutely love it. These headphones are much better in my opinion than either the Bose noise cancelling headphones or the Jabra headphones I have used in the past. Excellent sound with rich bass and easy to use functions. As others have mentioned these headphones do have a deep bass sound which I think is great. The re-chargebale battery is wonderful and I still have not had to charge them after a month of a fair amount of use. They even fold up to put into the little storage bag that comes with them. These headphones work particularly well with my Apple devices as there is an Apple wireless chip in them. These are great mid-range headphones for a fair price. Quite frankly, these are the best headphones I have ever had. I highly recommend them.

Just a heads up, these are knock offs. Pieces were falling apart the second I opened the box so that was my original reason I started the return process. I had no experience with beats so after I decided to return them because they were falling apart I went to Best Buy and tried on a pair, when then I realized they were not the same thing at all. I’m really surprised amazon is allowing this. I didn’t believe the other reviews, I thought they had some accidental fluke. Nope, they’re completely fake and very cheap bad plastic. Save your money and your time. $20 ear buds would be a wiser purchase, or save a little more and buy the real thing.

The sound was good, but the ear piece part was small for my taste. It put a lot of pressure on the outside of my ears...it wasn't super comfortable. If you have large ears, you may want to try them on first. But sound wise, they were great.

Let me start by saying that I got Beats after they lowered the price to $150 (I think they were $300 or something like that before September 2019). If I had to pay $300 I'd probably send them back and try some other brands known for the sound quality (Bose, Sony). Anyway, for $150 I'm pretty happy with the purchase.
First of all, they are very stylish. If you're looking for a product with a cool design, you won't be disappointed. I personally like the way they look and it feels good to have them on. Beats are easily adjustable, not too heavy, overall they fit pretty well.
It's super easy to connect them to all Apple devices. iPhone, iPad, MacBook, you name it. I connect them to a few different devices and never have any issues.
Unfortunately, the sound is not that great. It's not bad but I personally don't see any difference between beats and regular AirPods. I was expecting more for $300 headphones.
