They have felt great so far and I've now had them for a few months and don't notice much wear and tear. They sound amazing still and the battery lasts for more than enough time for whatever activity. I constantly use them for the gym and school as well and they are perfect. For the price I would highly recommend

My beats seem pretty legit. The box came sealed with plastic wrap . I also registered them on the Beats website and they popped right up. I returned the Rose Gold pair because I work out too much and the white material seems like it would get dirty too fast. So far I’m satisfied.

I love them they are great. They have a great sound quality and are very comfortable. I was using them in a restaurant and I couldn't hear the music playing in the background. Even though they don't have electric noise canceling any background noise is hard to hear. I like how they came with a cord to use when the headphone dies. Great quality.

I was happy with the headphones, but after 6 months the right side stopped working when being used in bluetooth mode. It works completely fine if using the cable. I did some research online and apparently others have experienced a similar situation. Someone mentioned to try using the cable, but barely touch it to the port and that does bring both back to working, but as soon as you move it will stop working again. For the price of this product i expected better quality that would last.

This are my new favorite headphones. I have absolutely no complaints. The fact that they come with a detachable cord in case you forget to charge them is very nice (even if most phones can't use the cord anymore).

Also, if you have any kind of problem with them, you get access to Apple's world class customer support. Just to be clear, there was no sarcasm in that last statement, they go above and beyond. I only wish I had purchased an iPhone...

I have had many problems with the pair of beats I ordered. First of all, the hinges started making some weird noise after moderate use of 2 weeks. When the ear cups loosened up, it started leaking so much noise. It is really irritating in college so I will get the studio 3 and give the solo 3 to my gf.

Overrated in my opinion. I've owned these for a 1 year and 3 months and they are now dead. I used these 3 times a week at the gym. For $300.00 I feel like headphones should last a couple years. The once a month charging was nice but I will not be buying any more Beats.

AWESOME! If you’re on the fence about buying these then JUST DO IT! It’s crazy how well they cancel out background noise. Me and my kids “experimented” with it when they first arrived. Unbelievable! These were for my son. My daughter has a pair too. I’m definitely getting me a pair next!!

I’ve tried the ones that go inside the ears and they end up falling out when I’m walking or running. These stay on and I love how everything around me seems like they’re dancing to my music. I love these!

Giving it a 5 star. Not to many complaints, except I have small ears and the covers are a bit uncomfortable at times. We purchased these and another high quality name brand pair of headphones and between the 2 I chose these! Great sound quality, great battery life & looks amazing!

Bought these as a Christmas gift for my daughter and she loves them. They must work really well because she never hears me or my wife calling her when she has them on lol. The versatility that they can be used wirelessly or with the cord comes in handy since she uses them so much. Her favorite pair of headphones by far.

I have used these once, to SIT at my desk and work on a project. I haven't used them in a while, they are fully charged and only the right ear works. I tried pairing them with a different phone, same thing.
I will never buy beats again!

I suppose I get what I pay for, but it was still dissappointing when they stopped holding a charge and the right hand side stopped working. No longer wireless, but they still can deter unwanted attention on the train, so I still use them plenty.

I bought this headset and the first time I tried to use it using the wired feature, because of mp3 player is not Bluetooth I could only hear music out of one ear until I pushed the interrupt button then the music came out of both sides. NOT A GOOD PRODUCT. I sent them back the day I received them.

Beautiful color and great quality-these were a Christmas gift for my daughter and she loves them. I’ve tried them a few times and like them as much as my Bose noice cancellation headphones. These are super comfortable to wear!

Came in the original packaging. Just like the ones I had before purchased at AT&T store. Authentic. REVIEW UPDATE THE 1ST ONE VOLUME BUTTON STOP S=WORKING SENT IT IN AND GOT NEW ONE AND NOW THESE NEW ONE'S THE BLUETOOTH KEEPS TURNING OFF !!!!

The beats came in what appeared to be good condition, but they do not work to talk on the phone. I don’t know if it’s an issue with the beats themselves, or the actual wire that came with the beats to use for phone calls, but when I plug the cord in, the audio only comes out of one ear and it’s bad quality. Other than this, they look good cosmetically but I was really looking forward to using them for calls as well as normal audio. They are also used. Not worth the money

UPDATE: I made a phone call to Apple and they helped me to get a replacement pair of Beat Solo3. So far so good...

I bought these March 7,2018 for my daughter’s 14th birthday. She loved them until May 20th, 2018 when they would no longer charge. They are no good to us now that they won’t charge, $200 wasted.

I love my beats! They aren’t completely noise cancelling, but they have great sound. Super cute and comes with a storage pouch. I dye my hair and some of the color came off on the white parts, but I just say it makes them uniquely mine. But for real the white does get dirty quickly

Great headphones for the price!! I would definitely recommend for anyone that wants good quality Bluetooth headset for a minimal price, but two caveats, one if they are one your ears for too long, they can feel uncomfortable for a minute or so when you take them off, also the volume control on the headset is great but messes up at times making me accidentally pause or skip songs entirely. However, it is overall great and worth the money if you have it!

The sound is not audiophile quality, heavy on bass, and overall good sound quality. But what really makes them great is the technology - the W1 chip, in combination with the iPhone 7 is a great combination. Battery life is insane (in the almost 2 months I have them, I have charged them only twice. Range is also insane while connectivity is a breeze. This is the perfect wireless combination for iPhone 7, hands down.

Not worth the price, sound is not of quality with other headphones of similar pricing, Bluetooth connectivity is spotty in a multiresidential environment and made with cheap materials. Mine broke at the plastic fold mechanism, leather always pulling apart from earpiece and I babied this headset. Band is really tight, ears hurt after less than an hour of use. This came with holographic security, so assume they're real. They are just not worth the price, turns me off to any of their other products, present or future.

My daughter got these Beats for Christmas 2017, in June 2018 one side of the headphones quit working! Apparently that is common. Apple replaced them free of charge and all was good. Then in January 2019 one side of the extension area broke. Once again I contacted Apple support, however this time instead of a 1 year warranty, the replacements only had a 90 day warranty! So I could pay $129 plus S/H to get them repaired or I could spend another $200 and just buy new ones! Neither option appealed to me!!! VERY FRUSTRATED!!!!!!!!
The sound is phenomenal!!! They have made my weightlifting better by being able to have more momentum by listening to music and I can do cardio for longer.

With regular use, these quit working in one ear after only a couple of months. Called Apple for repair and they wanted to charge me $129 to fix or advised that I could donate the headphones. After researching this model more online, this is a known defect. Certainly not the quality I'd expect at this price point. Overall, my son loved them. We got them repaired and now he hardly used them.

This is the 3rd pair of beats I have purchased from here that has broken. The all have broke in a similar way. They all have gotten a short. This pair particularly I bought brand new and they worked for like 3 months until getting a short. I recommend not to buy them from here.

As always, a great product from this company. I’m so happy I bought another pair after losing my last pair in a rental car and getting no help retrieving them. They’re my go to headphones when I’m in a louder space and still need to study.
These beats have lasted me months without losing any of its quality. I'm able to store them in my gym bag, my work locker, and use them on a daily basis without any problems.
Daughter loves them and so do I. Impressive sound and build quality. Have been used everyday since Christmas and still haven’t needed charging, so I’d say the claimed battery life is very close.

Bought these as a Christmas gift for my son whose been dying to have a pair. He loves them. He compared them to a pair of Skullcandy headphones he had and said he likes the Beats better. He stated the sound quality is great and the bass sounds awesome.
My son absolutely loves these. Cant tell you how many times I've scared him bc of the noise cancelling or been screaming and get no response. He said they are very comfortable also
They’re a permanent fixture on my husbands head! LOL He really loves them, and wears them all of the time. It’s great that he can answer calls with them on too. Great purchase!

I have this product for about two years now. After about one year the cushions were totally unusable and I had to replace them. I never dropped my headphone and always treated it nicely, however, after 1.5 years the wireless connection on the right headphone was totally broken and I had to use it only with wire. Finally today, when I was taking it off of my head the right arm broke for no reason and I had to glue it unless it doesn't stay on my head. I don't like the material of this product, it's very fragile. For a premier product it's not acceptable and I don't recommend it!

For the price of these headphones its not worth it , you're really paying for the name. At most these are $80 headphones , the bass quality is Disappointing ! I've had other brands with way more bass , the sound clarity is nice tho. You here ever sound crisp , just not loud enough. I had some skull candy headphones years ago and they were ridiculous with the bass !

Left side of headphones stopped working; I'd only had them for about a month. Will attempt to return but since it's past the deadline I don't know if I'll be able to do this. Over $100 down the drain......
I bought these for my son for Christmas. He says they are really nice and he cant hear anything outside of the music. I asked him what he would rate these, and he said 4.5.
Love Beats products!!! Excellent sound quality and battery life!!!

I use these headphones for EVERYTHING. I've owned $500 studio headphones and I am perfectly happy recording with these. If you're looking for a pair of headphones you can take from the gym to the library to the studio, look no further.
I wasn’t a big beats fan. They seem cheaply made and didn’t hold up. My 15 yr old wanted these so I bought for him. They seem to be made better but time will tell. They sound absolutely GREAT.

I waited by the door for these to arrive, just like a kid on Christmas! The packaging was great, the items were amazing and even came with a limited edition case and limited edition Disney pin! The Disney Dr. Dre Beats have been so far the most amazing ones that I have seen!!!!! Well worth the money, every dime!!!

Bought these for the gym and office. Now find I use them everywhere. Prefer them over my Bose! And can't beat the price compared to the Bose. Very comfortable. Nice small soft-sided case included. Simple set up, easy on and off. So glad I made this purchase!
I wear them every day, both at work, at the gym and even when I go to my son's baseball practices. Very durable, very comfortable and the sound is excellent.

LOVE LOVE LOVE my Beats Solo3 headphones!!!!!!!!!!!!! Sound is perfect, comes with protective case thats chic, and they're Rose Gold! Gets good range as well! I can leave my phone anywhere in my house and take my headphones all the way across the house and they'll still pick up. Great battery life as well!
This is good for sound quality but it does hurt my ears while using.

One of my favorite purchases on amazon. You can do no wrong; sound is crisp and loud. This is super easy to use. And so pretty! I’m really happy about this. I am not one of those technical heads that can get down to the nitty gritty on breaking down stuff

Great pair of legit easy to use Beats headphones. I registered my beats with the official Beats website and they are 100% authentic. It came in an original Beats box with easy to understand instructions . Sound quality is studio sound, noise cancellation is top notch and the material for the earmuffs is very comfortable. Battery life is considerably long while it doesn’t take long at all for a full charge. Apple device Bluetooth pairing is fast and easy(will pair with non apple device). Definitely a must buy for anyone looking for legit Beats headphones, especially if you have an iPhone.

It was good. Couldn’t exceexise with them. They were kinda tight on my ears after listening with them for a while but the sound quality and durability is outstanding. Too bad someone ended up stealing them from my old job at the goodwill warehouse
I love these. I use them all the time to drown out background noise so I can concentrate or listen to music. I even use them when working out. Great battery life and easy to use.

Expensive and WORTH EVERY PENNY!
It took me a grand total of 10 seconds to connect these headphones to my iMac and my iPhone! Sound is very good. Ergonomics are excellent! Battery life so far is exceptional!

My daughter hasn’t taken these off since she opened this package. The sound is perfect and the noise cancelation feature is perfect for a loud environment. Comes with optional wire just in case you forget to charge them.
Great purchase and I saved a ton of money buying these on amazon instead of at the Apple store.

I love the sound quality and the battery life. I can go a week without charging them and I listen to them, on average, 3 hours per day. The material is nice. The ear cushions feel nice against my ears. I don't know that they warrant the high price tag, though. My biggest disappointment is the volume. I like to get lost in my music, and although the quality of sound is great, I wish I could get a few more decibels out of em'. I've listened to headphones half the price I paid for these that we louder.
I really enjoy my beats headphones. The battery life is awesome. Sound quality is pretty good. Could be a bit more comfortable for extended wear but all in all great!
Excellent battery life, noise cancelling not so good on a plane, ears hurt after long period

Theses headphones work great for the gym. My only complaint is that I wish they were a little louder. I have AirPods and I feel like the AirPods are louder than these. They work great for the gym though and the bass is really good.

Overall quality was good. I'm not a name brand hater so Im open to give all products a chance. I bought these for my kid, and he has been very happy with them. I compared them to my M50x's and the sound is "comparable". These are on ear so they are not the same sound "depth" as my over ear M50's. They do have benefits though: smaller, and wireless. I may buy them again.

I choose to return this Solo 3 because it makes my ear painful... it’s so tight that makes your ear feel stressful. I have to take off it 30 mins after I use it and do it again in a route...
Its music quality is OK. Not bad not good. But do not suggest because it makes ear painful

These might have gotten a better review but i bought my wife the airpod pros and myself these

No comparison, hands down airpods pro are 100 times better

Just received the headphones today, so I'll update the review if things change. I registered these as soon as I got them to verify they are authentic, no problem there. The headphones are comfortable and fit perfect (I am a very small adult female and they fit perfect). They paired easily with my iPhone and MacBook. The sound is great, not overly "bassy". Overall I am 100% happy with this purchase.

Used this item 3 times and then it stopped working! The “Beats” name used to stand for quality! It’s safe to say that’s no longer the case! And they do NOT stand behind their over-priced products either!!

These are the best Headphones that I have ever purchased. Sounds great, fits snug on the ears and a really good price. These headphones are a good quality product and even when connect to my phone and answering calls the sound quality is good. Overall great product at a great price.

The first pair of these Beats that I purchased wouldn’t stay connected via Bluetooth to my iPhone. After resetting 3 times, they still wouldn’t work and would only stay connected for 2-3 minutes before disconnecting. I returned for a second pair that wouldn’t even hold a charge, let alone connect to my phone. As soon as the lights would alert that it was fully charged the battery would die. Definitely not refurbished, but broken.
Perfect for jogging or just enjoying music without distraction. Has a nice stereo sounds, its a much better sound then regular headphones. Worth the money, battery last long for long roadtrips.
Very disappointed with the case my beats came in. For the price of the headsets and the fragility of them I would have thought a better case would received received.

I love these headphone. I’ve bough Bears before and I loved them. So I thought I’d buy these and I wasn’t disappointed. I love that they fold nicely and they don’t take up too much space. I’m mostly going to be using these for when I travel. They replaced my old Bose headphone which are still my favorite but they aren’t wireless like there are.

have had these headphones a little over a year now. they are work headphones so i use them through the week but never travel with them or do anything with them besides sit at a desk monday through friday. the headphones are almost completely worn off and the earpieces are coming off and revealing the cheap foam underneath.. Extremely disappointing for an almost $200 pair of headphones, they absolutely should last more than a year.
Don't bother with these and put the money towards a decent pair of headphones that will actually hold up. These are a total waste.
Worth the cost plus limited edition looks way coolll

These headphones are for those who want great sound but really also want stylish wireless headphones; especially guys as they are larger. I am sure there are better headphones but as far as looks, price, sound, they are some of the best out there and their sales and presence in gyms prove that.

Very good headphones. Battery life is absurdly long. I think I go 3-4 weeks between charges even when I use them a couple hours a day. Sound quality is great. Clear, undistorted sound at any volume. The muffs are super soft too.
I bought a used one, but it was like a new. The quality of this brand is always rigid, and your head won't feel pain after wearing long hours. Cute color and great design.

Sound quality (range of frequency response) wasn't what I had hoped - bass not heavy and treble not as clear as other headphones in the same price range. Tried numerous sound settings on both my iPhone and my Mac. Still, it's solidly built but would recommend getting the extended warranty. My hunch is if used by an 'active' person (hiker, runner, etc.) the combination of natural shock absorption and sweat will increase the 'age' of the product.

Bought Beats, bought Asurion policy, Beats broke twice. First time Asurion fixed, 2nd time Asurion is jacking us around. They send label, we send back, Asurion sends them back to us still broken; no repair or attempt at repair made.
We bought them to use, not to spend all of our time mailing them back and forth to Asurion,
Poor quality.
Poor follow through on Asurion's part.
The whole thing is a fiasco.
Best headphones I have owned. I used earphones before and the beasts solo3 are comfortable cancel enough noise and the music sound quality is second to none.

my daughter was very happy with her beats .. it was a very good choice I recommend this seller. Thank you for fulfilling everything is in very good condition and shipping was very fast thank you....
mi hija quedo muy contenta con sus Beats 3 ... fue una muy buena elección Recomiendo este vendedor. Gracias por cumplir con todo.. está en muy buenas condiciones y el envío fue muy rápido gracias
I didn't use these until I was traveling a lot. Only ONE side will work. They are terrible. I missed my window of return because I hadn't used them to know how terrible they were.

I was really excited to try these headphones and when I got them I was unfortunately let down. They squeezed my head so hard I got a headache 2 days in a row. The ear pads are also really uncomfortable in my opinion. Sound quality was pretty good but poor noise cancellation. Overall I can see why people like these but if you have a small head and ears like me good luck.

I got about a years worth of use from these headphones before they started to give me some problems. First, the bluetooth function stopped working and shortly after the audio in the right ear cup stopped working as well. So now they only work with the wire and audio only comes out from the left ear cup. Id definitely recommend spending your money on a different pair of headphones.
LOVE LOVE LOVE!! These are my first pair and they sound good and look good. Happy early birthday to me!!
It’s not a noise cancelation headphone. If it’s what you looking for. But if go outdoors stuff it’s great.
At the beginning I had a little struggle adjusting the microphone volume during a call. Does not use the same type of charger as iPhones, has a micro USB. Other than that it is great!

Wow, as a consumer of all things nerdy... I’m blown away. The sound is epic. Old songs have a new life. I plan to sleep in these to drown out the err... night noises of my partner. They are squishy and comfortable. Most headphones make my ears ache after a bit. Not these. Even with them on and no music... noise cancelling! (What did you say?). Ha!
I have these as a gift to my niece who plays the cello. She was so excited to receive them, she jumped up and gave my husband and I a big hug. She's very happy with them.

I bought is for my daughter would have rated 5 stars if it didn't keep disconnecting every 30 mins. Its annoying to have to reconnect. I will be contacting Amazon to asked questions. I might returned it if it continues.

I'm a music lover and I love this headphone. The sound is beautiful, love the easiness to connect wireless to my iphone, and the 3.5mm cord makes it easy to connect to other phones or devices too, the price is very reasonable, the delivery is very fast, I also love the case and the color of the headphone, it's just completely perfect for me. I don't normally give reviews online but I can't help beccause I'm so happy for this product. I hope this will last me for a long time! :)
Bought these anticipatting the hype. The bluetooth disconnects when I'm less than two blocks away from my apartment and I cannot get it to reconnect unless I'm in a room

Ordered these last Christmas for my daughter. She LOVES them - but ear cushions are already torn from use so she can’t wear them anymore! wish the material held up better especially for how much I paid.

I purchased these for a long international trip that was moved from January to May. When I went to use the headphones for the first time I found that there is sound in only one ear. These are defective and I am now outside of the return window.

I highly recommend purchasing them elsewhere and make certain they not defective immediately.
What is beats for my wife she loves the fit they cancel out the noise they’re smaller than some of the beats around the ears , Bluetooth has really long range and these things stay charged forever!

Most expensive pair of headphones I’ve ever owned, however they are totally worth the price tag. The color is “brick red” but they’re actually like a dark pink. I use these at the gym and at home, they’re great for both!

Purchased these head phones jan 2018, ive dropped them many times, i workout in them and still work brand new, just scratched up from all the drops it had, upgrading to the studio 3s, higly recommended the solos for the price, sound quality and bass is ridiculous

Never liked beats before, I always thought that they were overprices POS. I was wrong. The sound quality on these is incredible, they rival my sennheiser hd 598s, more bass but those are low in bass. I didn't think I'd like the on the ear design, but it's really not that bad. If I have them on for 5+ hours it begins to bother my industrial piercing but that's it. Amazing battery life, connect to my phone far better than my cheapo $30 Bluetooth earbuds from Anker. I've never experienced an issue with these headphones

These have had to be sent to Apple 3 times in the last 3 months because the bluetooth keeps dropping. I am on my third brand new pair, and the same thing happens. I am using a iPhone 7+, and the genius bar has no idea except they keep replacing them.

Avoid. These are terrible and unreliable.

After several weeks of researching, comparing and reading reviews, we bought the Beats Solo3 Wireless Headphones. I originally wanted the Bose QuietComfort 35’s or the Beats Studios. I tried them on, tested them out in-store and was having a hard time deciding. I saw a pair of th Solo3’s and tried them on, (not sure how I’d feel about the on-ear versus the over-the-eat style.) I was amazed that the Solo3 sounded just as great as the Bose (in my opinion). While not offering noise canceling, I could still hear most things around me with the Bose and Beats Studios. I felt the sound quality was just as good and I could hear just as much noise with the Solo3’s as the other two with noise-canceling. So we bought two, had them for 2 weeks now and traveled with them... we are extremely happy with them and would buy them again!

Great product - but hurts my ears after about 30 minutes. Too bad. I wish there were a means to adjust so that it wouldn't squeeze so tight. Surprised QC did not address this problem before releasing what could have otherwise been a really great set of headphones.
Had them 2 days. They’re going back. They randomly disconnect and when we use the microphone the headphones shut down & wont turn back on unless you unplug them. Junk. Not worth $20!
Purchased these for my daughter and she loves them. No complaints.
Long battery life. Good sound. Got it on sale. Love the bluetooth. Makes working out at the gym a lot easier. I do think they're over priced but I'm glad I bought them.
One of the crappiest thing I have ever bought broke the six months after I got them,bought the extra warranties and they still would not replace them

I like the sound quality. I don’t care for how tight they seem to be around my head. I prefer a more loose set of headphones. I have a pair of Powerbeats that I prefer more since they are less bulky. Great sound, bass is also good. They do what they should for the price.

I received my 1st pair as a gift. I must say I was terribly disappointed at how quickly they broke. But, they are Beats. The sound is crisp... amazing. I had to replace them. Thank goodness they were on sale!!

I am in shock at the quality of the headphones I received. I gave them as a gift to my daughter Christmas morning. When she opened them, supposedly brand new, one side was dangling and barely attached at all. Also, the white material in the ear piece looked like it had been worn quite a bit and was ripped away from the ear piece. Such a disappointment since this was the “big” gift for my daughter this year. I’m not sure who is to blame for this fiasco, but it was very frustrating.

I had these headphones for less than a year, and I don't even use them anymore due to their quality and inability to function anymore. They started off perfect, then less than 2 months later it starts having connectivity issues, and battery issues, the lights don't even display the right information anymore (Lights show Beats are charging when they are not). Overall, one of the worst purchases I have ever made. I want a solid refund or a replacement, very dissatisfied.
Great product, fast shipping.

Bought it when it was on sale for $219 and love it. Good sound and easy to use. Also it's very stable even when I'm working out or using it for a run, and I have a pretty small head as well :) We shall see how long this thing works!
Stopped working after nine months and ear pads completely disintegrated don’t recommend. Two pairs owned same issue. Pricy lesson learnt don’t buy

The Beats Solo 3 have been great. The connect to my phone, tablet and watch easily and the battery life is amazing. After purchasing them I made 3 cross country trips and never had to charge them. The sound quality is amazing. My only complaint is that when using them for extended periods my ears can get a little sore. I'm very happy with my purchase.
Bought for my son for Christmas. He loves them, they work very well. Sound quality is amazing. They are made wit good material. The price was reasonable.

My headphones came sealed and brand new. I don’t know why some people are saying theirs were fake ??!
They should first check out the sellers page and see the reviews.
But anyhow I like my Mickey noise beats. The only problem is the Bluetooth calling :( everyone says they can’t hear me well. Maybe it doesn’t work well outdoors ??

The BEST headphones I have ever owned. Im a bit of a sucker for looks and brand which people criticize a lot of Beats users for but I say screw those people because you can have both looks AND quality with Beats. I had the beats solo 2 wireless and I cant begin to tell you what a step up the Solo 3's are. The battery life is seriously unbelievable. I use them ranging from 3-4 hours a day and sometimes up to 6 hours (I use them for work) and the battery lasts WEEKS its seriously incredible. When the battery gets low ill charge for 5 minutes and it's back up to 3 dots. It's INCREDIBLE, I dont even think my old Nokia's battery lasted this long! The finish of these headphones is about the same as the Solo 2's except for the gorgeous shiny rose gold accents as opposed to the fully matte finish of the Solo 2's. These headphones look amazing, sound even better, and the battery lasts a ridiculously long time. The price tag is hefty but as someone who uses these every day for work they were worth every penny.

I've noticed some people complaining about the same issue the Solo 2's had. It's uncomfortable to use them for an extended period of time because they are tight. Yes, at first they ARE pretty tight on your skull and are unbearable for over 2 hours. However, over time they DO stretch out and guys this happens to most On-Ear headphones. If you have very large ears I would recommend getting the Studios since they are OVER ear. If you want to speed out the stretch out process just stretch them out over something about the same size as your head and leave them overnight. Repeat this until they are comfy although dont stretch them too much or they will fall easily. I use these now for up to 6 hours at a time and they are very comfy. If you have earrings you might want to take them off before prolonged use, the back of the earrings will be poking into your skull.

Overall these headphones impressed me and this is coming from someone who already owned the great Solo 2's. You will not regret getting these.

*I did NOT receive these for free or discounted price, I paid full price for them and this review and my opinion are MY OWN and not influenced in any way.

The sound quality was very good, but the headphones leak a lot of sound so if you're listening in a quiet place, everyone can hear your music. Also, these headphones are not headphones for being active, because they fall off a lot. The material and the quality of them though, is very good. Also very comfortable. Again though, if you plan on doing anything active, these are not the right ones. Update, the rubber cushion on the head strap came off of the headphones

luv these headphones, no doubt, connect with press of a button on iPhone, but should come on automatic without no touch!
dr dre has to fix this problem! a bit pricey! well worth the sound! and also when its too hot, your ears be sweating! so i settled for smaller ear plugs!
comes with a wire , in case battery goes down, but it has a great battery life!

These sound great but within 3 Months the plastic on the adjuster band split. The item was defective but beats would not honor the warranty and wanted to charge $129 to fix. Expected better quality materials and for beats to stand behind their products.

These are great!
The wireless function does peter out in very cold weather - so if you plan to be walking around in cold weather you may be disappointed. That's a definite thing. Happened to me once, but I don't make it a habit to be outside in cold weather. Aside from that, like I said - Great! Particularly the battery life!

Very disappointed, one side stopped working approximately 13 months after purchasing. Beats/apple customer service stated it would be better/cheaper to buy a new pair. Pretty expensive for 13 months of use.

I’d love to give this a full 5 star over all, however when I’m working out and go go lower my head, the headphones half the time slide around my head/ears and lately they’ve started falling off. The headband has adjustable settings which are nice, but I have mine set on the shortest. Maybe it’s bc I’ve had mine for 2 years and they’ve ‘stretched? I’m not sure. The stability is the only issue I have, everything is perfect

Bought these because they hold a charge for 40 hours of playback which is true and I'm happy to report it took almost a month of use before needing it's first charge. However, these have been charging for almost 2 days now and it still shows one light on the charging indicator. I've tried several different outlets, chargers and cords.....no luck. Furthermore I've tried to get product support twice now and no luck can't hey anyone to respond. If I get some help in happy to change this review but I'm getting impatient right now. At this point I will never but a beats product again nor will I buy high dollar items through Amazon again if I don't get help soon.

The pause/skip button glitches and sometimes doesn’t function until I reset the headphones. The cover for the earmuff padding has also come loose from its adhesive exposing the padded foam. Overall these are my favorite headphones yet, but they were poorly made. I have owned them for less than two years.

I normally purchase from Best Buy, my last pair of solo 3 beats broke...after about 2 years or so. Decided to purchase a new pair, although amazon made me a bit skeptical at first... I decided to purchase a pair. Although the reviews on amazon for this product was
Pretty negative. My package looks REAL, although the case for the beats solo 3 DO NOT come with white inside, at least the last pair I purchased from Best Buy did NOT have the white lining. The packaged was sealed so I’m hoping these are real and not a rip off. For now we’ll see how well these new beats are. I would of given it a 5* but like I said the case for beats looked off.
We love these beats! This was our first purchase and they’re amazing! The sound is high quality and it cancels the rest. The only downfall is the way they slide on my head but otherwise I love them!

Great sound but quality of the headphones is poor. A few months after purchase, I had to send them back because the fabric on the headphones came apart. All warranties go through Apple, so they sent a replacement. Well, it recently happened AGAIN! Apparently, they only warranty for 90 days when they send a replacement so they offered the option of buying another pair for $100. No thanks...

These sound decent, bass is garbage and they hurt my ears after long periods of use. Bought them for $140 so i had to jump on them given their msrp is $300. Overall, fit and finish is great and sound quality is okay .
Well can’t really say much about this but it kind of broke after a month of using ,I don’t know if it’s apples fault or this was just not of the best quality

These Beats appear to be authentic. They have great sound and I love the rose gold color. It was super easy to pair them with my iPhone 7. Additionally, I selected the 1 day shipping method at 11pm and they were at my doorstep the following day at 2:15pm! I couldn’t be happier.

Terrible they stopped working after 3 weeks. The left ear would not work at all on wireless. We did some troubleshooting and they reset but immediately stopped working again. I researched the issue and it is very common with the solo3 wireless headphones. My son loved them, but we returned for a refund.
They started falling apart after a couple of months the ear covers then 3 month one side stop working don't buy one had$30 pair last a lot longer

I'm a frequent business traveler and these headphones are exactly what I needed for business trips. They drown out noise on the plane and make it possible to take a nap with ease. Also great for daily commuting on public transportation. You can receive calls directly through the headphones so makes it especially easy to communicate while on the go!

Noise cancellation worked but after a month of wearing them (how convenient that the return window closed after a month) they started giving my husband BAD headaches. Did some research and realized it’s like sticking your head in a microwave it’s so bad for you! Not sure the quality of noise cancellation outweighs the health risks associated with it.
The noise cancellation is great. The sound is awesome, but these honestly hurt my ears to wear for extended periods. I’m giving them to my sister.
Doesn't stay on or connected to Bluetooth turns on and off won't charge or turn on anymore
Don't really have much noise isolation but amazing sound quality and bass not very good for kids but let's face it you get beats to pump the bass up got at good price 150 overall great for the price
My husband got it for me and the battery life last for a long time. I go to the gym 4-5 times a week for 1-2 hours and i only have to charge it maybe twice a month.

My daughter loves her new Beats Solo3. She loves the rose gold color and the fact that she can't hear me when I'm calling her when she has them on :-). She
says it sounds really good and clear. The price was excellent. Love it!
The Beats wireless headset was a great gift, my grandson cried when he open it up. He just loved it and very clear. His dad also liked it.
A thirteenth birthday gift for my grandson -- he was thrilled. Perfect color and he said they were the most comfortable he'd used,, along with great sound. Nannie got a high-five and a hug!
I buy a beats solo 3 from Amzon warehouse deals and a get a fake

This was a gift for my niece and she loves it! I will be ordering one for myself as well!! It was shipped and delivered right before Christmas. This style does not go out of style and the ear buds are super soft and handle is sleek. The black color matches with everything, that’s why she wanted it as well. I highly recommend 👍🏼
Bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas. She is in love with them. Couldn't beat the price at the time since they dropped because of Black Friday.

First I was spectical that these were even on sale because we all know Beats are overpriced for what you get. Thank being said, since these are discounted they are definitely a great buy. I wouldn't spend $300 on these but I will $220. These are real and they came in the original packaging.

Now for the review. As others have noticed that Beats are very bass heavy, I like this even though I listen to a lot of metal but to some they don't like it. The sound populated is excellent. There aren't any cracks or interruptions at all. These are a very high quality SOUND headphone. My issue isn't with the sound or the Bluetooth connectivity.

These headphones, as other solos are, are built cheap. The sound coming out is great but the design is made out of plastic and i wouldn't recommend anyone going to the gym with these. Get the power beats if you're going to the gym. These feel like they will break and I have a feeling they will If I drop them hard enough. The ear cups re great leather quality and feel comfortable. I wish they went away with the plastic and made all the models like the beats pro were. The material in the design definitely needs work.

The Bluetooth connectivity is marvelous with this W1 chip. The range is insane. I went outside my house and down the street and was still connected without interuption. i don't understand everyone saying connecting is any different. Yes there's a pop up that says connect but all my other bluetooth headphones automatically connect after the initial set up anyway so I don't get this "amaazing set up" everyone is talking about.

One more thing I would like to point out are phone calls. The phone calls are so crystal clear. No one can tell I'm using headphones which is hard with Bluetooth nowadays. All around these are a great buy and I would buy them again (not for $300 of course). Sound quality is great, cal quality is great, if you can get over the plastic buy these!
Save yourself a headache and get Bose instead of Beats. These Beats are slightly cheaper, but they're a lot less comfortable if you have a normal to large sized head.
Got these for my wife. They are lightweight, comfortable to wear, they sound amazing, and the battery life is THE BEST PART. If you can afford these headphones, get them! Seriously...get them.
Perfect! I have a pair of these that I recieved as a gift. I love them, so I bought a pair for my husband. He loves them. We use them everyday. The quality is excellent and the sound is great.

Good sounding headphones, just didn't like the fact they look bulky on your head, meaning they stick out really far. They don't cover your whole ear like the Studio's do. They are also I bit tight if you don't have a small head. Other than that , they work well.

comfortability - 3 quality of product - 7
Awesome sound, very comfortable, easily syncs with my phone. So much better than my old headphones. Wish I had bought two so my wife would stop stealing them.

I’ve onky fully charged this set of headphones once since I bought them. I’ve taken them to the gym at least 30 minutes maybe 8-10 times and haven’t had to recharge them. They fit pretty comfortably and don’t really squeeze to tight. They sound great except not as loud as a previous set that I own. Th bass is not where near what it used to be. But over all still pretty good
Can’t pull these off my child’s head. It’s an everyday accessory. She loves them. Great sound and battery life. Comfort is there as well.

I was so worried if these were real or fake beats especially given the reviews...however I received real genuine beats in an unopened package...delivery was fast and so far the sound quality and battery life are great.

You get caught on the name, and think is a great product, but are OK. A little too heavy, a few hours on your head you want to take them off. BOSE are much lighter , The sound is good, and it syncs with my iPhone easily.
The battery is literally always dead. Always. Does not last the advertised 40hrs. Wish I could send them back. Of course the sound is great, but please fix the power supply.
The headphones themselves look pretty premium, the rose gold and white combination look great, and the bass and subwoofer are what you'd expect from a Beats product.

They go the extra mile selling fake beats. I would recommend just buying these at best buy. The packaging and design match the authentic beats almost perfectly, with minor discrepancies. But i believe they are fake because the W1 chip it is supposed to have didnt connect to my ipad air 2 like advertised, and the comfort of these headphones werent the same as the ones i wore in store at best buy. And the sound quality was pathetic, my cheap asus laptop has better sound than these.

So I know everyone is seeing all these one star reviews and how they’re fake and too cheap and stuff however, I checked the serial number, and everything was in check and these are indeed 100% real beats. I just got them today and I also saw others have trouble 4 months down the road. If anything happens In the next 4 months, I’ll probably take this review down or just add on but bottom line is that the beats I received were in fact real beats
I love these and wear them every day at work! I wear them when I grocery shop- when I run errands and when I’m in the waiting room at the Dr’s office

These are great over the ear headphones. I didn't want to jump on the iPod craze as I was afraid I would misplace them, but also do not like the "in ear" feel. These are comfortable and they fold so that they are easy to store and transport when not in use.

Ouch! Maybe just me, and maybe I have a large head, but these things were very painful after wearing for only 15 minutes. Thankfully, I was able to return them without a hassle. Otherwise, the sound quality was excellent.

Had them a few weeks now. Could not be happier. I was apprehensive about buying them as I’ve never had really nice headphones before but they’re a fantastic product. Easy pairing. Great sound quality. Not noice cancelling but very good sound quality & overeat gives all I need in this department. Super long battery life. Comfortable. The case is sleek & provides good protection.

Definitely the best investment in headphones I have ever made. The quality in sound is absolutely amazing. They are also very comfortable and just nice to look at. The carrying case is great to have when traveling and also keeps them from getting dusty when you’re not using them. Overall if you want great quality sound and performance, you will want these headphones.

I love everything about these headphones, except for the built-in mic. When receiving or making phone calls, the person on the other line can barely hear me because the mic picks up all surrounding sounds. Wish Beats would fix this!
I typically wouldn't ever spend more than $40 on a pair of headphones but I LOVE my breasts so much. I just them for the gym and not only is the quality amazing but the fit is great as well.

After 1 month of having my first pair, the battery stopped charging. When I tried to charge them, no light would light up and when trying to turn them on a red light would blink. Since they were still under warranty I returned them and they gave me new pair. About 13 months later (right when the warranty expired), the battery stopped charging again. When I went to Apple to get them fixed they were going to charge me $126!!! Save yourself from some trouble and just buy another brand.
After farther review, I found that these headphones only cover the ear and not over the entire ear. After receiving this set, I returned it back to Amazon without opening the box.
Good headphones. I have to use over ear headphones because earbuds make my head hurt. These are a great trade off and the Bluetooth works really well
I love these and they are the best gift to myself ever
Headphones sound amazing. But they do not last too long. They break down quickly. Muffs may fall off, and the sound may stop working abruptly. get a warranty.
right side stopped working after 8 months of using them at my desk...
Within 6 months of getting them the charged section stopped working. Had them replaced and the same thing happened again. I wouldn't ever buy Beats ever again. Not worth the price.
Fun set of headphones. Great sound quality.

The sound is amazing and they're so comfortable! I think these are the best headphones I've ever had.

IMPORTANT NOTE: You should get a hard case to store them.

Some months after the purchase, the left headphone just stopped working when connected to bluetooth, but it worked perfectly fine when I used the 3,5mm jack. Luckily, I managed to get some new ones from Apple.

My guess is that storing them in the provided fabric bag harmed somehow the wiring, since the headphones barely fit in it.

Works great with apple products. Husband uses them to work out, run (and they stay on), now the lawn, etc.

Phone calls come through clear also.

No complaints.
Great product for the price! Very serviceable headphones for TV, PC and music. Easy bluetooth connection and nice case and cables

Conectado con el cable, parece ser que se activan los controles de alguna manera, no lo he probado mas conectado. La batería dura y dura como ninguno que haya tenido. El sonido es muy bueno. My boyfriend lost his old beats -_- he needed a new pair of headphones before our trip to the DR so he ordered these hoping they would be great even though he was skeptical of them being wireless but he loves them. No complaints. No issues.

Daughter had same pair before but somehow they got sat on and broke. So got these as replacement because they are amazing.

This was bought for my youngest daughter. My other 3 children owned some & all loved them. She is happy with the color, despite not being her first choice. I can say that these headphones last, as my girls have had them for years.
LOVE THESE SO MUCH. Perfect for yoga or the gym. They don’t slide off, they block most noises and the music sounds great.
Great headphones but I can only turn my headphones up to half volume before others can hear my music so if your looking for high volume noise canceling headphones look elsewhere.
Bought these for my 14 year old son for Christmas. Best Gift EVER!!! My son loves these head phone. Wears it 24/7 (typical teenager). Quality is great. Price is amazing.

Super awesome headphones!! Bought these for my daughter end of February 2017– she has used them eevvvverrryyyydaayyyyy for HOURS since... work perfectly, sounds is amazing... highly recommend them!! Actually going to be buying another pair for our other daughter for Christmas!
Got them for my girlfriend for her birthday and she loves them! They look and sound great! Might even have to buy a pair for my self! Definitely recommend!

Bought them as a Christmas gift for my daughter. She seems to enjoy them, perhaps a little too much. No complaints from her.

I am very happy with these and I get a ton of compliments on this edition of my Beats. They did not come with a charger or the cord pictured, which wasn't a deal breaker for me once I got them but it could be for someone else. I would definitely recommend these.

This was a gift but I got the silver/white ones for myself. Absolutely the most comfortable set of headphones I've ever used. Great isolation from outside noise (like on a plane), great sound quality and battery life. Easy pairing and use with an iPhone.
I returned them. I thought they would be noise cancelling (especially for the price). They are not. They were uncomfortable and sound quality was sub-par. I suggest the Cowin headphones instead.

love the headphones bought them for all my long summer flights on the planes....but the cord to plug into the TV on the plane stopped working after one use. Contacted Apple and they replaced but only had sound in one ear all the way home on a 5 hour flight. Hope the next time I use them I don't have this issue again!!

Don't buy these. These are the second pair I've gotten and they both stopped working in the same way. The first pair worked for about 2 weeks then it started having issue with charging and connecting wirelessly. Amazon replaced them and after a few more weeks, the same issue has come up. Now the 2nd pair doesn't charge properly or connect wirelessly. Too much money to spend on headphones that malfunction so easily.
My 3 year old Beats by Dre finally gave up. So i purchased this new SOLO one. I am glad this one has more hours for listening.

These headphones are super cute, and work well. If you're planning on using these to workout you should be aware of the pros and cons.
Pros: You can put your phone down and not have to worry about dropping it.
Cons: When you sweat, they slip off your head and the pads get squishy.

Love this product. My only issue is the bluetooth doesn't pair as well with computers that aren't Apple products. Sometimes after wearing them for an extended period of time my ears do start to ache a bit. Overall, the sound quality is great and the battery life is amazing.

The Beats Solo3 is definitely better than the Solo2, but i still feel these headphones pinch my ears, which makes it a bit painful for someone who wears glasses. If I didn't wear glasses, I would probably buy it again 10/10.

Best headphones I own! The sound quality is amazing. If you're in the market for wireless over the ear headphones, these are the ones. It also has a wire to hook them up directly to your device, if you run out of battery.

So comfortable to wear because they don't slip around on my head. The only thing that I don't like is how hot my ears get while I'm wearing them. But, I thought that might happen with the full ear coverage. It is worth it to have such great sound while I'm walking, out doing yard work, or working. On top of all that, I love the color. They're pretty!
These are so perfect for travel at cutting out the external noise so I can hear what I really want to be listening to!
I love the headphones they’re by far the best purchase I’ve made, very comfortable and the sound is pure. Awesome!
Good sound. Don’t like the way it feels on my ears. Recommend Bose headphones. Much much better fit, sound, noise cancellation and comfortable.

Cons:
Uncomfortable after long wear
Doesn't turn on when not connected to source directly
