Great that I received someone else's used beats... I was a little skeptical when the box was not even wrapped. When I opened it, the headphones were scratched up and the cups had earwax in them. Absolutely unlike Amazon to send used beats when they are marked as new. When I paired to the device, it already pops up as Christian's beats solo 3. So Christian, absolutely brilliant but you need to clean your ears. As if that wasn't enough, the left ear just did not work at all. Very disappointed. Save yourself the trouble, buy these at best buy for the same price.

Received these today and they are difinently not beats. They are the cheapest knock off I can imagine. No power button, no volume buttons, no charging port and no markings of beats at all. I would not buy these with the chance of paying $220 for a product you aren't sure you are receiving. To bad makes me question amazon
Every since Apple has purchased beats this product has been garbage. I have purchased four pairs of beats in a year. The same issue: one speaker goes out. This is only after 2 months.
Awesome for the price!! They still slip when sweaty at the gym, but the sound is great and since I bought them on Amazon Prime Day I got a killer deal!

The headphones lasted me almost 11 months. Went out on me from the right side. As far as noise cancellation, it lacks that. Durability is good as many times as I dropped them. Is it worth the price? No. The sound doesn’t sound worth $150. They only charge because they have a name. For $150 they could of fixed up the bass. I’m a bass lover and there wasn’t too much bass for me out of these headphones.
The batteries last at least a week. The sound is great. The build is strong. Love the look and over all, fantastic.

Got these bad boys during a amazing Amazon sale. Head phones work great. Love the look of these. The sound is very good but not great (get Bose for that). Would i get these at full price? Probably not but under $200 sign me up!
Got these for the kids. Quality and build is nice, but honestly surprised at how much better Bose is then these.

I love these headphones! They're gorgeous and sleek just like I wanted and the sound quality is great! Of course they're a little on the pricier side, but this pair I actually found for the best price without needing to take the risk of getting a refurbished one. I would definitely recommend getting these from Amazon or at least showing this listing to Target so they can price match for you!
very nice music is awesome almost like being there
Ummm idk about the negative comments...these Beats are NOT fake...i brought them to Apple Store & they are authentic...sound is amazing!! My daughter loves them
Muy bueno
Came with broken plug in microphone set. Wouldn’t let me return. Too small for my ears. Doesn’t cancel out much noise and volume is not very loud for the “beats” label in my opinion.

Easily the best headphones I’ve ever had, both in sound and durability. Not to mention the controls on the left side give all the controls you need to be handsfree! I wore them to work 5 nights a week for over two years before any problems. I felt like I got my money’s worth and bought a second pair!
You can never go wrong with Beats. My husband is very happy working in the garage on his toys, Beats on his headand off he goes.. Great Choice. Shipping and all was great Service .. Thanks
They came in new packaging, they’re not refurbished. They sound incredible, and improvements to the material have made it far more durable than the original Beats headphones.

I gave it overall 2 stars because the headphones were working great. Then 6 months after i got them the Bluetooth feature stopped working. That was one of the reasons i bought them. They are mock off beats the paint also started coming off. I am so close to returning them.
It's 1 year July 2019 to July 15,2020. It's not charging. It has warranty for 3 years. Please email let me knew. Send me alother.
Gifted my son with these and he loves them. Definitely can't hear anything outside of the headphones and the hearing quality is great.

I'm no expert, but these things are nothing short of awesome...and I don't mind paying for awesome. They remind me of my favorite set of Koss headphones back in my high school / Pink Floyd days.
Very comfortable, great sound, and the level of tech is simply amazing.

I’m very active and cannot wear those tiny ear buds (my ears are small and they just don’t fit right). These headphones paired instantly with my iPhone 10. Super stylish! I wear them running, weightlifting and even for travel.

In love! I like how it pairs so easily with my iPhone and I’m particularly fond of the sound quality. The microphone is super clear - it picks up whispers and talking from people across the room. Such a great product and a great value!

The sound was great and all but the headphones just felt a little used. Shipping was fast though but I'm going to have to ask for a refund. I bought these for my girlfriend and my sister has the same ones; these didn't very much look the ones my sister got from best buy.

I have been using these headphones at the gym every day for a couple months now and the headphones have gotten loose to the point that I have to hold them in place if I am doing anything like looking down... a bit disappointed as I have taken extremely careful care of them and always put them back in case when not in use.
The only problem I have with these headphones is the fact that I cannot wear them to the gym. They simply do not stay on if you are not sitting or standing in an upright position.

My lady wanted them so I bought them. she seems to love them over the one the Sony's wireless that I bought her. She said that these are more stylist, sound better and the rose gold definitely looks better. Happy wife happy life right? To me they look good they sound good and for $245 well she's happy LOL

About his beats headphones for my daughter! They are very expensive but the quality of the headphone is worth every penny. They are Bluetooth or you can actually hook up the auxiliary cord! When you have these headphones on you can cancel everything around you very high-quality sound!
These are AMAZING!!!! Love them!!!
After only one use, only able to hear sound in one ear. Looked online and this is a frequent occurrence with these headphones.
These work great but check out the other products before spending $300 on these. My sony wired $20 headphones sound just as good. Classic example of paying too much for a brand name.
Absolutely love my these. I use them in the gym all the time. The stay on my head for the most part when I am doing HIIT or Crossfit workouts which is great.

Had less than a year and the black inner ear portion is wearing off and the white foam is exposed. The headphones are are also very stretched out and dont stay on very well. Disappointed they are falling apart considering they are not used that often and were very expensive!

Stylish and comfortable fit. Not the best sound quality by any means, but not a three star pair of headphones. I love that you can call and answer calls with them. Very convenient. Would definitely recommended them ESPECIALLY if they are on sale.

THE best piece of personal audio equipment I have ever owned. The W1 chip and the flat-frequency response pave way to long distance connectivity and BEAUTIFUL sound. They are expensive...if you can swallow the price, you won;t have any buyer's remorse. Simple incredible.

Bought these for my fifteen year old daughter. They are very soft and comfortable on the ears, and do an excellent job of noise cancellation. She is able to concentrate on her school work while being surrounded two crazy loud brothers. They last a LONG, LONG time before needing to be charged. She uses them daily and needs to charge only about once a week. Great quality!

I know that these aren’t the cheapest headphones on the market, but you definitely get when you’re paying for! The sound quality is phenomenal and the battery life is amazing! I love them and use them everyday and only need to charge them every 3-4weeks.
These sound great and bluetooth works well, but they seriously clamped my head like a vise with my glasses on. I could no longer take it and purchased another brand instead.

Should have gone with competitor’s product.
Had to stretch out for almost a month to avoid pain from being too tight. Sound quality is not as stellar as advertised.

Was very very upset and disappointed with this purchase. The color of the headphones did not match with the ones in the box. The box that it was was in looked like it had been ran through the st. And they were missing the auxiliary cord and charging cord in the box. Horrible experience never ordering from again.

This is my first ever time buying BEATS, and let me tell you, I am very impress not only with the quality of sound and the overall great look of the head phones, but mostly because of how much playing time you get of them this is my 3rd week of usage and I have not charge them yet, they still have low 30 %.

Highly recommended product
Great sound but a little too large for me yet too tight on my ears. Leaves my ears swollen and red after use. I think for the price, you can easily find better headphones.
Very disappointing. The sound quality is nothing special compared to cheap ear buds. It is also so tight and hurts, and i am 120 lb.
Great way to get the minions to listen to their music in private and they love them! High quality sound, great battery life, and "coolness" factor suitable for a pre-teen.

It's a great product. If you're into noise cancellation headphones, these are a really great buy. I ordered rose gold but the color is just a tad bit off. Other than that no complaints. They do require to be charged when you get them because they don't come fully charged. Sound quality is awesome, especially if you're into bass. These headphones get really loud, so that's another plus.

I was excited after purchasing my Beats solo 3 wireless headphones . But l am very disappointed that after one year they broke, and l was looking for a top quality product , so the right speaker had not sound...l took it to best buy and they told me and it was no way to fix it . After spending a lot of money it breaks down it less than 2 years.
Perfect
Love these. The sound is so crisp and just so clear. Quality headphones.

Bought for my daughter for Christmas 2016. We travel quite a bit and is so nice on the road, flights, everywhere. Works everywhere, everytime. Want to get myself one, but a bit pricey for me. Hopefully price will come down.

These are the second pair of beats I have purchased, and they are great. I know they get a lot of complaints by music professionals as not being "the" top quality music output. However, to my amateur ears, I think that they are perfectly fine. The battery lasts forever....I usually have to charge them only every 2-3 weeks, and use them almost every day. Compared to pretty much any other rechargeable product, their battery life is amazing. I don't know how many long haul flights I have planned, and the morning of realized that I had forgotten to charge my ipad/computer...etc. These headphones are great, since they last so long. The music quality is more than sufficient for me, and the fact that they fold up means I can throw them in my purse pretty easily. I use them on my commute, for travel, and when I work out! Great product.

Item worked for a few months. Now they will not ppwer on and stay on. Upon trying to regoster for support unable to do so. I do not see help offered from Amazon site for assistance. Since beat is a apple product usually they will assist if you can prove you purchased within past year. Beats and Aplle are good companies for thier products. I will not cut corners anymore to purchase them however.
Haven’t had any issues yet!

Very nice headphones. The color style stands out. My son gets lots of compliments. Had initially purchased these headphones for my 11 year old but they were a little small. Gave this pair to my 8year old and purchased the Studio'S for my 11 year old and everyone is happy. Cancels sound, quick and easy connectivity, plays music with a crisp sound and the superior look makes this a great purchase. Fast and quick delivery.
I love my solo 3's rose gold, they are so lit and the Bluetooth is the best part. Don't share with your friends 💯🎶😂🎧

I use this for intense, mobile, jumping work outs. Doesn't fall of my head. Sound is loud enough, but I wish it could get louder for when I am in loud atmosphere. Quality is fine, nothing to rave about.

Good product. Just not sure why I paid over $200 for headphones.

Make sure you ensure you are buying the condition you want (new/used). I bought the new ones, they are so nice. Smells like the beloved interior of a brand new car! Easy connect with my Samsung S6 & all the controls work well (answering call with headphones, volume, etc..). Comfortable & the matte black looks nice. And of course the sound is amazing!!
Sound quality is great, but they hurt my ears because of how they are positioned directly on ear. Should have gone with the Studio3.
What more needs to be said, these beats are awesome! Great price on prime day. I’m glad I waited. I’ve been wanting these for a long time.
We had a very happy kid when he opened these up! They work better than we could have ever imagined!
Bought for my daughter- they’re great! Easy to use, comfortable, sturdy. Long lasting battery. Expensive but worth it.

Unfortunately, I am going to return these, and for one simple reason: Even with a full charge, the headphones shut off after being in the cold for as little as 15 minutes. And I'm not talking about arctic temps, I'm merely outside in mid-20's degrees, and the battery shuts down. I looked at the beats website and other sites, and this is a well-known design flaw. If you are solely in warmer climates, then the headphones may be for you (they sound great). Otherwise, be warned.
I bought these for my 13 year old son and he loves them. Quality is very good, sound is awesome. I also love that he got a carrying case with it also.

Gift for a 9 yr old. First my grand daughter hugged the box, then she open them, put them on and we lost her for the rest of the entire night. LOL She was very happy with this product. Got them to match her Mommy’s. Happy camper. Sound is superb.
damn thing stopped playing out the right side after 3 months. THREE months. piece of crap! And then the hinge on one side broke so they are useless.
These are awesome! Very clear, cancel out others quite well! 😂. They’re small, hold a charge for along time! Love them
Una buena opción de audífonos para el gimnasio, para correr y otras actividades. La batería tiene buena duración.

At this price the charge should last 12 years. Otherwise, my daughter never lets them out of her site. The noise cancellation is superb because when she get all tweeny on they go, then off my mouth goes.
Legit real brand new beats. I think they was open box. Still had plastic on them never used and came with everything
Bought these for my daughter months ago. I am really impressed with the quality. She loves them.

These headphones are absolutely worth the price. The sound quality is phenomenal, and is great for anything from working out to studying. The battery life is also amazing. The only reason I would rate this product a 4, and not higher, is because if I wear them for too long they start to hurt my head from the position. This could just be a personal problem.
Great headphones - comfortable, noise cancelling and excellent bass response - recommend these
Best wireless speakers I’ve ever owned. Battery life is AMAZING!! charges up quickly as well. Love the fit. The sound quality is amazing. Great great gift idea.

I obviously bought this pair of headphones for the appearance, and it doesn’t disappoint. But the sound is meh, and they squeeze my head like a vice grip, so I can’t say I don’t have some regrets. I wish there was a way to relax the tension on the headband so it’s not so tight.

I love them. Easy to pair with my car and Android phone. Beautiful. Expensively made. A little tight at first but better tight than lose for years of wear because the leather may give in time and you don't want them falling off. Sound quality could use improvement. Base versus treble and clear ness.

6 months after purchasing the product new, one side stopped working. Amazon is the seller and they had purchased this product from Apple the year before, so we learned that the warranty wouldn’t cover it and the cost to repair ($300) was twice the purchase cost ($160). I guess next time we purchase the extra warranty, research it more, or purchase a product that will last more than 6 months.

These are amazing, beautiful headphones!! I had the wired solos before and they somehow seemed louder to me, but oh well, still love these. They’re so comfortable! Wish I could boost the loudness somehow though..
Good headphones. Some of the material came off the earbuds part but nothing is wrong with the quality of the headphones.
This must have been the 3rd headset I've bought within a 2-year span and, this is by far the best headset I've ever had in my entire life.

Had these beats for only about a year old and the right side just completely stopped working. No sound or anything. You would think something of this price would match in quality. Very disappointed in this product.

These fell apart in less than a year. I know they were well loved but for the price they should have lasted. A 13 year old tending to them. Not a young kid. I’m sure he’s a little rough but there is no reason the blue tooth function stopped working early on. Then the actual pieces on the ear cuffs started to fall off. Disappointing

Fits great. Battery power is unbelievable. 2 full days and they’re still going.
I can drown out all the kids!
❤️
Wow the left ear doesn't work after 2 months. what a waste of my money please don't waste your time.

Bought them for the wife so I haven't used them personally but she raves about them. She says she's been over the whole house and they haven't dropped/cut out once. Sound quality is excellent and they are very comfortable to wear (I've tried them on and they are quite literally "on-ear" as you can feel them rest on your ears). Seem to fit a little smaller than the average headphone which is great as they fit smaller heads. Battery life is as advertised.
Sound quality and size are perfect I just don’t like how my hair always gets stuck in the crevices and pulls

Can you please replace my beats Solo 3 wireless on earphone cause ther some damage in the right folding and its seems it's not tightly in close and it's loose but every thing is fine the sound is perfect the only problem is that right folding area please help mo for this and I'm your valid costumer always looking for something to buy but this is the first time I'm requesting for replacement
Gift for someone. They loved it
I gave them to my 12 year old grandson, he loved them so much his Dad wanted to take them! Great sound for the price.
Gorgeous headphones but they hurt when I'm wearing them because they press against my ears. Gives me a headache. I don't recommend. The bigger ones are way more comfortable.
Love, love, love these. I use them during my walks, running in the treadmill and sometimes just to block out sound around me.
As much as these headphones cost, you would think they would be more sturdy. First the covers on the cushions started coming off. Then they stopped working. Waist of over $220!
I've had these for a while, and just started using them more because I'm travelling a lot more. I like them, but after an hour the ears get sore. And I have a pretty small head.

My daughter loves these! She has had other headphones previously however, nothing compares to the wireless Beats in terms of quality and comfort. The sound quality is great and the feel on your ears is very comfortable. Purchasing a hard carrying case is a must to ensure these are kept protected at all times.

Earpiece is a little tight...and I have pretty small ears, but the noise reduction is good. Just can’t wear them for more than an hour which can be a little tough if watching a movie.
Beautiful color!
These headphones work really well and have great sound. The rose gold is a great color.

I love these headphones. My husband can be watching tv or playing his guitar and I don’t hear it. On an airplane the engine is barely audible. The battery life is amazing and having Mickey on them is just a plus! I can use my iPhone or iPod with them as it comes with a wire! I like the fact that old music or new the sound and volume level is the same!
Bought these to replace the ones I left on a plane. Perfect for me since I can’t use ear buds

They were my Mother’s Day gift.
I loved them.
3 months later I was using them one day and I tried turning them off.
They never turned off till they ran out of battery
Once the battery ran out I tried charging them and they wouldnt charge.
I’ve tried resetting them and everything apple tells me to do so far nothing’s worked:(
Before buying these I was skeptical about all the hype but these headphones are absolute quality. They live up to the hype! Sound quality is amazing. Worth the money.

I have had beats since the first Solo On-Ear Headphones came out. Since then, they have much improved on overall quality and comfort. So far my favorite is the Beats Solo3, though price-wise the original Solo cannot be beat. (the Solo2 was a disaster)

This headphones 🎧 rock. Deep bass. Clear treble. The best sounding headphones I have ever used. They are comfortable for extended wear. They have a 40 hour battery. I can’t say enough. Worth every penny.

We've loved these headphones, but the bluetooth stopped working on one side after 4 months of use. We've taken very good care of them, and they are great headphones, but for the price I planned on them lasting a lot longer than 4 months. The headphones still work with the cord ... but that kind of defeats the purpose of getting wireless headphones.
Loved it

Quality of sound is amazing. This is the second pair I’ve owned (first pair was stolen out of car). I was determined to replace them. Finally did and frankly a little disappointed in the actual hardware. It’s been a month, haven’t a used them too much, I usually need the smallest size setting but this pair is slightly defective, the left side doesn’t stay “closed” even when being worn. Aside from defect disappointment of this pair, highly recommend the brand.

While the sound quality is pretty good, the craftsmanship is absolute garbage. Within two months of owning mine, the leather on the ears was falling off and the carrying case has a wonky zipper. I do like them, but you can get much higher quality headphones for a similar price.

These are so awesome. I really wanted wireless headphones that would stay put while I was working out, and these do a beautiful job with that. So, I can work out, listen to amazing quality sound, and never re-adjust. I could get all technical and specific but I think that says it all!! They're pricey but so worth it! Added bonus, they look pretty too <3
This product does not work and I need to return. Only buy from Apple store
I really really really (yes 3x) love these headphone. perfect - love - great - good - amazing. I am using with my iphone and they sound great --- battery lasts forever.

I seriously wanted to love these.
Even using different EQ settings it just didn't have the quality of sound I've found from less expensive Bluetooth headphones. They have great battery life and range, but if you like to hear bass like, like a bass chello. Forget it. Even in deep bass EQ. it's a no go.
Just very unimpressed. Not at all what I expected or hoped for. Returning these.
Its an amazing headphone but the ear piece was to small for me and kept hurting my ears so exchanged it for a different beats

Apple has a problem with the batteries in their headphones. I've bought 4 pairs of them either for myself or as gifts and 2 of them have had the same battery failure issue. Eventually they just stop charging. Then you have to drive into the Apple store, wait in line, have them send them out, and drive back. Fortunately they often get stolen before they fail. That's about the best feature. The sound is good when they work. Would never buy another pair.
Got them for my son. He obviously can’t hear me when he’s wearing them. I literally have to walk over to him and tap him to get his attention.
Really great price on Amazon for this. These are going for $300+ everywhere else. I bought them for a low price, plus an additional 15% off with an Amazon coupon.

I'm loving these wireless headphones! Audiophiles complain about the sound quality but it sounds good to me and I listen to classical (think booming Wagner) to rock. The only drawbacks are the price tag and the less than intuitive controls. It comes w a storage bag which is nice for travel.
Update after a year of light use:. It's literally falling to pieces. Horrible build quality. Audio quality was great while it lasted. Expected a lot more durability at this price point.
A great buy !!! Bought for traveling on planes and it’s fantastic. Would totally buy again. So compact !!!
Great value for an awesome product. Sound is really nice. Bought it for my 11y/o year daughter. Should have bought one for me. Perfectly new condition.

Sound was ok. (not great. The minimum you would expect of 2019). Unfortunately, When you try to watch a video (posted 7-23-19), everything lags. YouTube, Netflix, etc. Perhaps I received a defect in product, but if not do not buy this. You can find a much better deal arround 20-30$. Also, the beats 2 were better.
Great price with Amazon prime day!!!!!

huge bass enhancement ( you can definitely tell from side-by-side comparison with Beyerdynamic T51i ), quite a lot clamping force. can't wear it for longer than 1 hour .
sound quality is decent, it's not bad imo, small sound stage due to the on-ear fact, human vocal is mushy and not as clear as other headphones within this price range. it's a fun headphone and like it so far.

Ignore all the haters, these headphones sound incredible. The battery life on these things blow my mind. It seems like 20+ hours of battery life and they recharge very quickly. Connectivity is a breeze with any Apple product and I would imagine the same can be said for Android products as well.

My package arrived sooner than expected, well packaged, nice and sleek. Would've preferred a hard carrying case as opposed to the soft one it came with, other than that I'm definitely satisfied. Thank you.

Bought these September 2019 after owning previous beats headphones for 4+ years. Within a couple months I noticed connectivity issues; it would randomly disconnect from my phone mid convo. Most recently, (four days ago) there's been no sound coming from the right side and as of tonight it won't connect via Bluetooth to my phone/ laptop.

It took about five months for me to decide to finally get them, and one I did my mind became blown! They are worth the purchase if you have been thinking about buying them. Perfect for the gym and easy to keep clean if you care for them. I recommend buying some covers for the ears just to make a little more comfortable but honestly you don’t have to. (This isn’t paid!)- Ranessa
Not impressive at all, I returned them. I then purchased a pair of Cowin E7 for 1/3 of the price of the Beats, same quality to me.
Very pleased. I have some less expensive, wired headphones that sound a little better, but none more convenient for mobility. Elegant push button design works well even with gloves on, or a hood.
Great headphones, great sound quality. Bought during prime day and got them for 70% off
Can’t believe it took me this long before I bought these. If you love music you need these Kick ass Don’t get wet or sweaty
Did not come in original package but case, cords and headphones in excellent shape! Amazing quality! Charge lasts days of use, sound is excellent and comfortable!
I bought these for my son and he reports them as having great sound quality. I found them to be easy to use and they are very portable as they fold up and fit into a smaller case.
They are great if your sitting on your couch. They dont cancel any noise. If its below 45° the battery last 15-20 minutes max. They are $50-$70 headphones all day long.
Easy to sync with phone. I had another pair of wireless beats and they would pair then not. It was frustrating, always repairing the headphones in mid song. Great sound - as always.
Work well and has good sound. Comfort level not so good. Hot and sweaty way too fast. For the price I expected something more comfortable.
Last 2 years, ready to toss in the garbage 😡 I have to glue both side, for the price? Should less longer.
Our 12 year old bought them with his own money. And he loves them. He has them on all the time! Makes it hard to call him out of his room. Bahahaha.

Battery life on these is crazy good. Excellent bass on these headphones and very nice quality. Can get a bit uncomfortable on the ears when on for a couple hours but other than that they are excellent
I do not find the headphones comfortable. I have to take them off frequently. I have bose headphones that are a lot more comfortable.

Right speaker went out within 2 months after normal wear - no active wear (running, working out, etc.) They were fantastic - great sound - better than last edition, though did become uncomfortable after extended use. Still bass heavy but sound was much improved.

I, of course, did not get the 4-year protection plan. Have been burnt on beats buds, but figured wireless wouldn't experience the same shortage issue.
My daughter loves them. My daughter has them on while she does her homework and she’s in her own zone.
No charging cable was included, this was the in packaging original most expensive version. Description stated all components included.

I like the light weight of the headset, the color which match my phone, did not know that when I ordered them, the sound is great, easy to connect and they are great for the gym. I do recommend them to whom would like to order them. Plus the battery last very long for use, so glad I ordered them

it works so good, my son enjoys doing his home work, listing to his music while I read a book.

I purchased this as a birthday gift for my girlfriend. She loves the sound quality of the headphones. She commented that she can now hear the tiniest background sounds while listening to podcasts.
Would never pay the $299. But I got them for 219.00!!! That's a price I can live with... I love these beats... I've had every generation and these are by far the best.

very easy to connect to my phone

great for running

Purchased for my autistic daughter and she loves it, perfect fit! Not heavy!

good product, on time and the features that I commented in the description

stop working on three different occasions - not over or undercharged. I have headphones that cost $14 from Walmart and never stopped working. Very Disappointed in an Apple brand! Sending back for a new pair or refund at $200 - are you kidding.

Battery life is great hardly ever have to charge. Also very good sound and durable.

Gift for my 13 yo and she couldn't be happier. Good price - I looked around - and works perfectly. She has commented on how easy they are to use, how they connect immediately, are so comfortable, etc. They look great, too. Very happy all around.

Bought this as a birthday gift for a friend 2 months ago and he STILL cannot stop thanking me for how great of a gift it is. He says the battery life is amazing and apparently can go 2 days without charging. And it’s also great for blocking out unwanted noises.... or people lol

Sound qaulity is very good and has a nice balance. The battery life is excellent and charges for the length advertised. The material qaulity is pretty good but not perfect. I guess they wanted a light feeling headset so it would be more comfortable. I would highly recommend buying this.

Love these things to death. My favorite headphones and the print on them is nice and crisp. I take good care of them and so far they haven’t chipped or cracked. Had them for about a year

I purchased these as a gift to my son for his 18th birthday. Needless to say, I got all smiles!!

Generally I wouldn't spend as much on headphones, but in this case they are worth every penny!

Really like these. They fit a little tight (and I don’t think I have a big head) but the tight fit makes them cancel out most outside noises. And I love being able to increase or decrease volume or pause what I’m listening to right from the headset.

Don’t get me wrong, these are good headphones. No issues connecting to my iPhone ever. Build quality is good. But sound wise? Your paying for the brand name. Nothing more. Good headphones, but not $300 good.

Amazing product! Love the wireless function. The only thing is when you’re working out you’ll be even more hot because the ears get really hot. But that’s obvious. The battery lasts me for like a week as I only use them for about an hour a day. Love it!

Very happy with these! Only tiny downside is the chrome right around where the charging port inserts chipped and broke the first few weeks. Minor cosmetic issue though. Battery lasts friggin forever! I listen for an hour at the gym everyday and only charge about once a month.

just what i needed. perfect for my office so i have the freedom to get up and move without being tied up with wires.

My wife loves these. As soon as she turns them on, something clicks inside her head that makes her clean the whole house in one fair swoop. If you are looking for complaints, there are none here.

Highly recommend this product. The description is conservative with respect to the battery life. Much longer than 40 hours. Quality exceeded our expectations as well noise cancellation. You can use on a loud airplane while traveling and hear nothing but the sweet sound of music/audio.

good sound quality easy use good batty life overall quality product

Great sound and I live the rose gold color. The case however is too small for the headphones and it's a struggle to get them in and out
Beats headphones are wonderful. They were exactly as order

It was a very good for a few months and then can no longer charged. The battery can last almost for a week and wireless is neat! Sound quality is okay. He brought them to college with him and claims to use them often. He is very happy with them

Wanted a decent pair of wireless headphones after always catching a cord at work and breaking other pairs. I looked at a few pairs, these, some Bose headphones and some V-Moda. Honestly these probably had the lowest reviews of the 3. Not bad reviews, but lower than the other two in general so I was hesitant. I also had never read great things about older Beats, but they came down in price some to about 70 less than the other two so I decided to give it a shot.

I am pleasantly surprised. I am by no means an audiophile so that may help, but I think they sound very good. Pretty full sound, I don't think it's the best by any means, but it's a good sound and enjoyable to listen to. Range also seems really good on the bluetooth.

As far as comfort. They definitely could be tight to some. They kind of clamp down on the ears. I don't find this bad, but it's definitely something to consider in a purchase. I think overall they are very comfortable so far. A little hot under the ears after a bit maybe, but not bad.

I would recommend them if you want a decent pair of wireless headphones. Good sound, easy to pair, comfortable. Oh, and it also came with 30 bucks on the itunes store or 3 months of apple music. Since I will use that it's like I saved another 30 bucks on them which really makes them a great deal.
